translation.en: Whoo hoo hoo! Ha ha!
translation.zh: （1970年 加勒比）

translation.en: ♪ Bang a gong get it on ♪
translation.zh: （根据真实故事改编）

translation.en: ♪ Ow! ♪
translation.zh: （1971年 东伦敦）

translation.en: Another Terry Leather low-mileage gem.
translation.zh: 又一辆特里莱瑟牌改装车

translation.en: Got your glad rags sorted out for your wedding tomorrow?
translation.zh: 明天婚礼的衣服准备好了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, of course, Terry.
translation.zh: 当然了 特里 全新的

translation.en: New suit. Two buttons, nine-inch bum flaps.
translation.zh: 当然了 特里 全新的 双排扣 23厘米下摆

translation.en: Nice. Ingrid will like that.
translation.zh: 不错 英格丽会喜欢的

translation.en: So, you're getting married tomorrow, Ingrid?
translation.zh: 明天就结婚了 英格丽？

translation.en: I hope so.
translation.zh: 希望顺利吧

translation.en: Go on. Get off on.
translation.zh: 走吧 回家去

translation.en: Go make yourself look more beautiful than you already are…
translation.zh: 去打扮打扮 让自己比平时更漂亮

translation.en: If that's possible.
translation.zh: 如果可能的话

translation.en: Terry, promise you won't get Eddie too legless tonight,
translation.zh: 特里 答应我别让艾迪喝太醉 好吗？

translation.en: will you, at his stag do?
translation.zh:
答应我别让艾迪喝太醉 好吗？ -在他的单身派对上
-只是去酒吧而已

translation.en: We're just going round the pub.
translation.zh:
-在他的单身派对上
-只是去酒吧而已

translation.en: Couple of pints and a singsong.
translation.zh: 喝点酒 唱唱歌

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: （大门）

translation.en: Fuck it. What are you trying to do to me, eh?
translation.zh: 你们是想怎么着？

translation.en: I've got Jessell's money.
translation.zh: 我会还钱给杰塞尔！

translation.en: The problem is, it's tied up in these cars,
translation.zh: 问题是想要钱就得靠这些车子

translation.en: and you wankers want to trash the lot of them.
translation.zh: 你们却想把它们都砸了

translation.en: Mr. Jessell doesn't care about your inventory.
translation.zh: 杰塞尔先生不关心你怎么挣钱

translation.en: Mr. Jessell wants to know when he's getting paid.
translation.zh: 杰塞尔先生只想知道什么时候还钱

translation.en: Any day, I swear, Perky.
translation.zh: 快了 我发誓 猪老大

translation.en: Oh… What did you call me? I called you Perky, Perky.
translation.zh:
-你叫我什么？
-我叫你猪老大

translation.en: Everyone calls you Perky and him Pinky.
translation.zh: 所有人都叫你猪老大 叫他猪老二

translation.en: -Pinky and Perky? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-猪老大和猪老二？
-没错

translation.en: They're fucking cartoon pigs on the telly.
translation.zh: 电视里的卡通猪

translation.en: What, people call us that behind our backs?
translation.zh: 什么 有人在背后这么叫我们？

translation.en: Well, they're not gonna say it to your face, are they?
translation.zh: 他们当然不会当面这样叫 不是吗？

translation.en: Well, you just bloody did.
translation.zh: 可你叫了

translation.en: Yeah. Well, you got me riled.
translation.zh: 你吓到我了

translation.en: You're very intimidating.
translation.zh: 你太吓人了

translation.en: Don't make us come back again.
translation.zh: 别让我们再来一次

translation.en: Not every customer is a satisfied customer.
translation.zh: 不是每个顾客都会满意

translation.en: What are you doing round here, Martine?
translation.zh: 你来这做什么 玛汀？

translation.en: -What are you doing tonight? -Tonight?
translation.zh:
-你今晚准备做点什么？
-今晚吗？

translation.en: Tonight is Eddie's stag do.
translation.zh:
今晚是艾迪的单身派对
我要带他出去喝两杯

translation.en: Taking him out for a drink. Why?
translation.zh:
今晚是艾迪的单身派对
我要带他出去喝两杯 -怎么了？
-我有个活儿找你 特里

translation.en: I've got a proposition for you, Terry.
translation.zh:
-怎么了？
-我有个活儿找你 特里

translation.en: A proposition?
translation.zh: 有个活儿？

translation.en: Can you meet me at the Players Club before you see the boys,
translation.zh:
在派对之前能跟我
在球员俱乐部碰个面吗？

translation.en: and I'll fill you in on the details?
translation.zh: 然后我再告诉你细节

translation.en: Make it 9:00.
translation.zh: 那就9点吧

translation.en: Ah, morning, Gale.
translation.zh: （三周前）

translation.en: Morning, Tim.
translation.zh:
-早上好 盖尔
-早上好 提姆

translation.en: Top floor? Summoned by the gods?
translation.zh:
到顶层啊 -被众神召唤了？
-差不多吧

translation.en: Well, something like that.
translation.zh:
-被众神召唤了？
-差不多吧

translation.en: Get up to any mischief this weekend?
translation.zh: 周末要去哪儿玩吗？

translation.en: Don't know what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 不知道你在说什么

translation.en: I'm a married man.
translation.zh: 我可是已婚男人

translation.en: What do you think? Am I presentable?
translation.zh: 怎么样 像样吗？

translation.en: Not sure about the tie, darling.
translation.zh: 领带可能有点歪 亲爱的

translation.en: Oh, what's this? Peace and love?
translation.zh: 这是什么？ 爱与和平？

translation.en: Too much of that nonsense, we'll both be out of a job.
translation.zh: 要是这样的话 我们都会失业的

translation.en: Michael Abdul Malik. Calls himself Michael X
translation.zh:
迈克阿卜杜勒马利克 自称迈克艾克斯
向马尔科姆艾克斯致敬

translation.en: in homage to Malcolm X, his American counterpart.
translation.zh:
自称迈克艾克斯
向马尔科姆艾克斯致敬 他的美国老乡

translation.en: The Pinko Press would have us believe
translation.zh:
左派媒体试图
让我们相信这位迈克艾克斯

translation.en: this Michael X is a crusading champion
translation.zh:
左派媒体试图
让我们相信这位迈克艾克斯 是为穷人和被压迫阶级斗争的战士

translation.en: of the poor and oppressed.
translation.zh: 是为穷人和被压迫阶级斗争的战士

translation.en: The Black Robin Hood of Notting Hill.
translation.zh: 诺丁山的黑人罗宾汉

translation.en: The richer, whiter, and more famous, the more they fawn over him.
translation.zh: 富人 白人和名流都奉承着他

translation.en: The truth is, he's a slum landlord, a drug dealer,
translation.zh: 但事实上他是贫民窟地主

translation.en: and a vicious pimp who should've been in prison years ago.
translation.zh: 是毒贩 是罪恶深重的皮条客 早就该被关起来

translation.en: [Michael] Are you not charging outrageous rents
translation.zh: （黑色之家） 你是不是向我的黑人兄弟姐妹们

translation.en: to my brothers and sisters, Mr. Brown?
translation.zh: 收取了高价房租 布郎先生？

translation.en: I'm charging the same as your slumlord friend Lew Vogel.
translation.zh:
我的房租和
你的房东朋友卢沃格尔一样

translation.en: Ten quid a week is too much for these shit holes.
translation.zh: 一周十英镑对这个鬼地方来说太贵了

translation.en: You know, I always wanted to meet a white man
translation.zh: 你知道… 我一直想认识个叫布朗的白人

translation.en: by the name of Brown.
translation.zh: 我一直想认识个叫布朗的白人

translation.en: You know what this is?
translation.zh: 知道这是什么吗？

translation.en: It is a slave collar, and the white man
translation.zh: 它是奴隶的项圈 白人让我的父母戴上了这个

translation.en: made my mothers and fathers wear this
translation.zh: 白人让我的父母戴上了这个 让他们服从他的意志

translation.en: to bend them to his will.
translation.zh: 让他们服从他的意志

translation.en: Can I bend you to my will, Mr. Brown?
translation.zh:
布朗先生
我能使你服从我的意志吗？

translation.en: He's your faithful dog now, Michael.
translation.zh: 你现在有条老实的狗了 迈克

translation.en: Michael, I don't think we should get our hopes up here.
translation.zh: 迈克 我觉得我们没有任何胜算

translation.en: Kidnapping, extortion,
translation.zh: 绑架 勒索

translation.en: assault on this man Brown here,
translation.zh: 袭击这个叫布朗的人

translation.en: as well as your previous problems with the law--
translation.zh: 再加上你的前科

translation.en: I mean, you could be looking at ten to 20 years for this.
translation.zh: 你可能会因此被判10到20年

translation.en: I don't think so.
translation.zh: 我不这么认为 我比白人们想的

translation.en: I am smarter and better protected than whitey thinks.
translation.zh: 我不这么认为 我比白人们想的 更聪明 更擅长保护自己

translation.en: [man] All rise.
translation.zh: 全体起立

translation.en: [man] Seems Michael X has managed to keep himself out of jail
translation.zh: 似乎迈克艾克斯通过威胁

translation.en: by threatening to release damning photographs
translation.zh: 要公布某个王室人物的私密照片

translation.en: of a certain royal personage.
translation.zh: 让自己免于了牢狱之灾

translation.en: Until we get our hands on these snaps, the police can't move.
translation.zh:
除非我们能解决这件事
否则警察就不会展开行动

translation.en: The public prosecutor won't move,
translation.zh: 检察官也不会

translation.en: and the home office doesn't want to know.
translation.zh: 而内政部根本不想知情

translation.en: Has anyone actually seen these photographs?
translation.zh: 真的有人看过照片吗？

translation.en: Yes, but at the moment,
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I'm not at liberty to say who that person is.
translation.zh: 但我无权透露是谁

translation.en: We've had Michael X under surveillance for quite a while.
translation.zh: 我们监视迈克艾克斯有一段时间了

translation.en: He keeps a safe deposit box at the Lloyds Bank in Marylebone.
translation.zh:
我们监视迈克艾克斯有一段时间了 他在马里波恩路的
劳埃德银行有一个保险箱

translation.en: We believe that's where the photos are located.
translation.zh: 我们相信照片就在那里

translation.en: Well, seems straightforward enough.
translation.zh: 似乎很简单

translation.en: I'll send a team into this bank
translation.zh: 我会派人去银行

translation.en: and take whatever he's got in the safe deposit box.
translation.zh: 把他保险箱里的东西都拿走

translation.en: That would have to be sanctioned at the highest level,
translation.zh: 那必须得到最高层的批准

translation.en: -and that's not going to happen. -Ah.
translation.zh: 但这不可能

translation.en: Do you see our problem?
translation.zh: 明白难题是什么了吗？

translation.en: There can be no connection to 506.
translation.zh: 这事必须与军情五处和六处毫无关联

translation.en: So, you want me to come up with something
translation.zh: 所以你是想让我想出一个

translation.en: that avoids any accountability for anyone.
translation.zh: 免除各方责任的办法

translation.en: We'd welcome suggestions, Tim.
translation.zh: 有想法可以说出来 提姆

translation.en: And if it all goes pear-shaped,
translation.zh: 如果出了岔子

translation.en: I assume it's my ass on the line.
translation.zh: 我猜需要负责的人是我

translation.en: You're young and ambitious, Tim.
translation.zh: 你还年轻 又有野心 提姆

translation.en: Chance to make a name for yourself.
translation.zh: 这是崭露头角的好机会

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢您 长官

translation.en: [woman on P.A.] Passengers arriving on boac flight 47,
translation.zh: 新抵达的乘客…

translation.en: bags arriving on baggage carousel number three.
translation.zh: （无申报通道）

translation.en: Excuse me there, miss. Can I have a word?
translation.zh:
-请留步 小姐 能跟您说句话吗？
-当然

translation.en: -Yes. -Where have you been?
translation.zh:
-请留步 小姐 能跟您说句话吗？
-当然 -您从哪儿回来？
-摩洛哥

translation.en: Morocco.
translation.zh:
-您从哪儿回来？
-摩洛哥

translation.en: I'll have to check your underwear.
translation.zh: 我需要检查您的内衣

translation.en: -Be my guest. -[knocks on door]
translation.zh: 请便

translation.en: We found what we were looking for.
translation.zh:
-要找的东西找到了
-找到什么了？

translation.en: Found what? What were you looking for?
translation.zh:
-要找的东西找到了
-找到什么了？ 你们在找什么？

translation.en: Oh, Tim. Thank God. I'm in a spot of bother.
translation.zh: 提姆 谢天谢地 我遇到麻烦了

translation.en: [Martine] What have you been up to? [Terry] Nothing much. You?
translation.zh:
-最近在忙什么？
-没什么 你呢？

translation.en: I was in Morocco recently.
translation.zh: 我最近去了趟摩洛哥

translation.en: Business or pleasure?
translation.zh:
-出差还是去玩
-都有

translation.en: Bit of both. Drinks are on me.
translation.zh:
-出差还是去玩
-都有 酒水我请了

translation.en: So, we gonna sit here all night making small talk?
translation.zh: 我们要整晚坐在这里闲聊吗？

translation.en: I know you, Terry,
translation.zh: 我了解你 泰瑞

translation.en: and I know your mates.
translation.zh: 我也了解你的搭档

translation.en: You've always been looking for the big score,
translation.zh: 你们总是想要赚一笔大的

translation.en: the one that makes sense of everything.
translation.zh: 大到可以解决所有问题

translation.en: I have it for you.
translation.zh: 现在有机会了

translation.en: -What? -A bank.
translation.zh: 什么？ 一家银行

translation.en: A bank? As in rob?
translation.zh: 一家银行？抢银行？

translation.en: How would you know about a bank?
translation.zh: 关于银行你了解什么？

translation.en: I've been seeing this guy,
translation.zh: 我最近交往的这个家伙是做生意的

translation.en: runs his own business-- Security systems.
translation.zh: 我最近交往的这个家伙是做生意的 安保系统生意

translation.en: Next month, they're installing new alarms in a bank in Marylebone.
translation.zh:
下个月他们要在马里波恩路的
一家银行安装新的警报器

translation.en: Seems like the trains have been setting off
translation.zh: 似乎是火车触发了保险库里的警报

translation.en: the tremor alarms in the vault and they've had to turn them off,
translation.zh: 所以他们不得不关掉警报

translation.en: so for a week or so, they won't have any.
translation.zh:
所以在一周左右的时间里
警报系统是无效的

translation.en: Now, why would he tell you all this?
translation.zh: 他为什么要告诉你这些？

translation.en: We were having a laugh about it.
translation.zh: 我们在拿它开玩笑

translation.en: "Imagine if half the villains in London
translation.zh:
他说：“想象一下 如果伦敦一半的
恶棍知道了这事儿会怎样”

translation.en: knew about this," He said, and I thought,
translation.zh:
他说：“想象一下 如果伦敦一半的
恶棍知道了这事儿会怎样” 我想着：“我就认识伦敦一半的恶棍

translation.en: "I know half the villains in London.
translation.zh: 我想着：“我就认识伦敦一半的恶棍

translation.en: I grew up with some of them."
translation.zh: 我还和其中一些是发小”

translation.en: Look. Me and my mates have been involved
translation.zh: 听着 我和搭档是干过

translation.en: with the odd bit of skullduggery,
translation.zh: 一些半点坏事

translation.en: but can you see us tooled up, taking on a bank like the James gang?
translation.zh: 但你能想象我们拿着枪去抢银行吗？

translation.en: This isn't about waving a water pistol at a cashier's head.
translation.zh: 不是要你们拿水枪指着出纳员的脑袋

translation.en: This is about getting into the basement where the deposit boxes are,
translation.zh: 只是让你们进入地下室拿走那里

translation.en: hidden, secret wealth-- money and jewels
translation.zh: 被人们藏起来的财富

translation.en: that are safe to steal because people won't report it.
translation.zh: 偷钱和珠宝很安全 因为失主不会去报案

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. We can't talk about this here.
translation.zh: 等等 这里不适合聊这些

translation.en: It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, Terry.
translation.zh: 这是一生难得的机会 特里

translation.en: We can't pass it up.
translation.zh: 我们不能错过

translation.en: Didn't expect this from you tonight, Martine.
translation.zh: 我没想过你会说这些 玛汀

translation.en: What did you expect, eh?
translation.zh: 那你想的是什么？

translation.en: I'll have to think about it.
translation.zh: 我得考虑考虑

translation.en: Better get off to your stag party.
translation.zh: 快去单身派对吧

translation.en: Thanks for the drink.
translation.zh: 多谢款待

translation.en: Eddie tells me his brother invited you to the wedding.
translation.zh: 艾迪说他哥哥邀请了你参加婚礼

translation.en: You going? I'll see you there.
translation.zh:
-你去吗？
-到时候见

translation.en: Can I get a Campari and soda, no ice? Yes, sir.
translation.zh:
-一杯不加冰的金巴利苏打酒？
-好的 先生

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Well, Tim, sweetie, what do you think?
translation.zh: 亲爱的提姆 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: -Is he up for it? -Maybe.
translation.zh: 他会答应吗？ 也许会

translation.en: Cheers, gorgeous.
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: So, you coming in?
translation.zh: 要进来吗？

translation.en: I don't know. It's late.
translation.zh: 不知道 已经很晚了

translation.en: Do you need to run home like a good, little boy?
translation.zh: 你要像个乖孩子一样跑回家吗？

translation.en: I guess I've got time.
translation.zh: 我想我还有些时间

translation.en: What, exactly, do you do?
translation.zh: 你到底是做什么的？

translation.en: Bit of this, bit of that.
translation.zh: 什么都沾点

translation.en: How did you and Hakim meet?
translation.zh: 你和哈基姆怎么认识的？

translation.en: I met Hakim in Los Angeles last spring.
translation.zh: 去年春天我在洛杉矶遇到了哈基姆

translation.en: He was raising money for a Black Montessori school
translation.zh:
他在为一所黑人
蒙特梭利学校筹集资金

translation.en: and writing his life story.
translation.zh: 还在写自己的传记

translation.en: [Michael] And what an extraordinary life it has been.
translation.zh: 多么非凡的一生啊

translation.en: The book is called "From the Dead Level: Malcolm X and Me."
translation.zh: 书名是《生死一线：马尔科姆和我》

translation.en: I read the manuscript.
translation.zh: 我已经读过手稿了 哈基姆是诗人

translation.en: Hakim is a poet, the voice of the Black soul.
translation.zh: 我已经读过手稿了 哈基姆是诗人 是黑人灵魂的发声者

translation.en: A friend is throwing a thing next week
translation.zh: 我们的朋友下周要办个派对

translation.en: to celebrate the launch of brother Hakim's book,
translation.zh: 我们的朋友下周要办个派对 来庆祝哈基姆兄弟新书出版

translation.en: and you are all invited.
translation.zh: 邀请大家所有人去

translation.en: Hakim, tell us more about your book.
translation.zh: 哈基姆 聊聊你的书吧

translation.en: It's about being born Black in America.
translation.zh: 它是讲述在美国出生的黑人

translation.en: Can any of you imagine what it is like to be born a Black man in this world?
translation.zh:
你们谁能想象在这个
世界上作为黑人出生是什么感觉吗？

translation.en: Can any of you white women imagine what it would be like
translation.zh: 你们白人女性中有谁能想象

translation.en: to bring a Black baby into this world?
translation.zh:
把一个黑人婴儿
带到世上会是什么感觉吗？

translation.en: [man] Evening, sir.
translation.zh: 晚上好 先生

translation.en: ♪ And said, "Dear boy I'm gonna make you a man…" ♪
translation.zh: （丹麦俱乐部） 继续啊！再来点！

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 继续啊！再来点！

translation.en: Ah, yeah! Whoa!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: [man] What do you think, Kev?
translation.zh: 你在想什么？

translation.en: Why are we even having this conversation?
translation.zh: 为什么要讨论这个？

translation.en: We're not--
translation.zh: 我们不是…

translation.en: Here's your beer.
translation.zh: 你们的啤酒

translation.en: We are not bank robbers.
translation.zh: 我们不是银行劫匪

translation.en: Maybe that's why we could get away with it.
translation.zh: 也许这是我们的好机会

translation.en: It's a bit daunting, isn't it?
translation.zh: 这有点吓人 不是吗？

translation.en: You know what scares me more?
translation.zh: 你知道更吓人的是什么吗？

translation.en: Living in Dar with nothing to show for it.
translation.zh: 生老病死 一无所成

translation.en: Do you know how old Mozart was was he composed his first minuet?
translation.zh:
你知道莫扎特创作
第一首小步舞曲时多大吗？

translation.en: -No. -Five.
translation.zh:
-不知道
-五岁

translation.en: Five. A fucking minuet.
translation.zh: 五岁就写了

translation.en: How would you know that fact, Terry?
translation.zh: 你是怎么知道的 特里？

translation.en: Because it's tattooed on that stripper's ass, Kevin.
translation.zh:
因为它纹在了
那个脱衣舞娘的屁股上 凯文

translation.en: What the fuck's it matter how I know?
translation.zh: 我怎么知道的有关系吗？

translation.en: It's a fact, and you're missing the point, Kev.
translation.zh: 事实是你没抓住重点 凯文

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is, it's time we stop fucking about
translation.zh: 我想说的是我们应该

translation.en: and stop picking the shit from under our fingernails.
translation.zh: 停止瞎混 结束碌碌无为了

translation.en: Schtum, lads. Coppers at 12 o'clock.
translation.zh: 别说了 警察在12点方向

translation.en: Oh, what are you two doing here personally?
translation.zh: 你们两位来这里做什么？

translation.en: I thought you were way past being your own bag man, Gerry.
translation.zh: 我以为你已经不再跑腿了 杰瑞

translation.en: Your associate Sonia Bern has raised prices
translation.zh: 你的合伙人 索尼娅伯恩 提高了她那家店的价格

translation.en: at that knocking shop of hers,
translation.zh: 提高了她那家店的价格

translation.en: 120 quid, up from 100. And your point?
translation.zh:
-从100英镑涨到了120英镑
-你想说什么？

translation.en: A rising tide lifts all ships, mate.
translation.zh: 水涨船高 伙计

translation.en: I think we're owed some money.
translation.zh: 我想有人欠了我们钱

translation.en: -Because even Sonia's can be raided. -Yeah. You'd do that, wouldn't you?
translation.zh:
-因为就连索尼娅那儿也会被搜查
-你们的确会那样做 对吧？

translation.en: You kill the goose that lays your golden egg.
translation.zh: 你们会杀鸡取卵

translation.en: Well, that would be dumb, wouldn't it?
translation.zh: 那很蠢 不是吗？

translation.en: But then again, everyone knows coppers are dumb.
translation.zh:
不过结果是
大家再一次知道了警察有多愚蠢

translation.en: Oh, well, you can do one thing for me.
translation.zh: 好吧 你们也帮我个忙

translation.en: You can stop your colleagues
translation.zh: 让你们的同事们

translation.en: from having their boys' night out in my clubs.
translation.zh: 不要再来我的俱乐部

translation.en: They're loud, they're lewd…
translation.zh: 他们很吵 很饥渴

translation.en: And they expect free oral sex.
translation.zh: 期望得到免费口交

translation.en: You know what? That's disgusting.
translation.zh: 知道吗？那很恶心 他们大多数人都有了自己的家庭

translation.en: Why, most of them have families.
translation.zh: 他们大多数人都有了自己的家庭

translation.en: We'll pass the word along.
translation.zh: 我们会传话的

translation.en: Lew, you tell your greedy, little bobbies
translation.zh: 卢 让你那些贪婪的小警察

translation.en: to go and find their perks elsewhere.
translation.zh: 去别处捞油水

translation.en: No one is gonna bother me.
translation.zh: 别来惹我

translation.en: My patrons could have the lot of these bad coppers put out to pasture.
translation.zh: 我的赞助人可以让他们都玩完

translation.en: Well, I say spread the wealth around and keep the peace.
translation.zh: 我说还是破财消灾就好

translation.en: Five quid a week extra. It's all it's worth.
translation.zh: 每周加五英镑 就这么多

translation.en: I'll pass it on.
translation.zh: 我会转告他们

translation.en: Drysdale.
translation.zh: 德赖斯代尔

translation.en: Urquhart. Ha ha!
translation.zh: 厄克特

translation.en: Lord Drysdale,
translation.zh: 德赖斯代尔勋爵

translation.en: can I offer you a drink before your session?
translation.zh: 在开始之前我能请您喝一杯吗？

translation.en: Very kind of you, Sonia.
translation.zh: 你真体贴 索尼娅

translation.en: Good to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: As well, Urquhart. As well.
translation.zh: 我也是 厄科特

translation.en: Good girl.
translation.zh: 乖宝贝

translation.en: Tighter. That's it. That's a good girl.
translation.zh: 更紧点点！就是这样 真是个好孩子

translation.en: -Everything ok? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-一切顺利吗？
-顺利

translation.en: You have been very naughty. Yes.
translation.zh: 你真调皮

translation.en: ♪ Whoa, yeah ♪
translation.zh: （恭喜艾迪和英格丽） 大声点

translation.en: Louder! Louder!
translation.zh: 再大声点

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: ♪ Follow my lead… ♪
translation.zh:
-我不会
-来嘛

translation.en: [woman] Give him a snog, Ingrid.
translation.zh: 给他一个吻 英格丽！

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: [man] Nice work, Eddie. Nice work.
translation.zh: 好样的 艾迪！

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你们好啊

translation.en: Saw you in a magazine the other day--
translation.zh: 前几天在杂志上看到你了

translation.en: Campari ad on the beach. Nice.
translation.zh: 海滩上的金巴利酒广告

translation.en: Must've been an old one. I'm not modeling anymore.
translation.zh:
-真不错
-一定是以前的广告 -我不再做模特了
-有何不可

translation.en: I don't know why. Still a knockout.
translation.zh:
-我不再做模特了
-有何不可 还是那么漂亮

translation.en: What you doing these days, Dave?
translation.zh: 戴夫 你最近在做什么？

translation.en: Me? Oh, a bit of film work.
translation.zh: 我吗？拍点电影

translation.en: Extra, you know?
translation.zh: 特别的那种 你懂的

translation.en: And you, Kevin, you're still snapping, I see.
translation.zh: 你呢 凯文？我看你还在拍照

translation.en: -The wedding photos? -No, no. It's just a favor for the family.
translation.zh: 婚礼照片吗 不是的 这只是帮忙

translation.en: Fashion is my game, fashion and passports.
translation.zh: 拍拍时尚大片 还有护照之类的

translation.en: And the odd snap of a wayward husband.
translation.zh: 还有任性丈夫的出轨照片

translation.en: [Kevin] Thank you, Dave. So, what's the verdict, boys?
translation.zh:
-谢了 戴夫
-所以你们的决定是什么？

translation.en: We're interested.
translation.zh: 我们有兴趣

translation.en: First thing we should do is take a look at the place,
translation.zh: 但我们要先去那地方看看

translation.en: suss it out, maybe open a box of our own.
translation.zh: 仔细观察下 也许自己先租个保险箱

translation.en: I've already done that. We can go and have a look tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我已经租好了 明天就可以去看

translation.en: Tomorrow, it is.
translation.zh: 那就明天咯

translation.en: [Dave] Heads up, lads. All right?
translation.zh:
-注意 伙计们
-没事吧？

translation.en: Oh, she's adorable, your little one. She's off.
translation.zh:
-真可爱的小家伙
-她睡着了

translation.en: What a gorgeous flower girl your eldest made.
translation.zh: 小花童也很漂亮

translation.en: Thanks. Katherine.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 凯瑟琳

translation.en: I do envy you.
translation.zh: 我真羡慕你

translation.en: -Kev, do you want to dance? -Yeah. Come on.
translation.zh:
-凯文 来跳舞吗？
-好啊

translation.en: It was lovely to see you all.
translation.zh: 见到你们大家真好

translation.en: -Ciao. -Ciao.
translation.zh:
-再见了
-还好吗 文？

translation.en: -All right, Wend. -All right.
translation.zh:
-再见了
-还好吗 文？ 很好

translation.en: She envies me. She being sarcastic?
translation.zh: 她羡慕我 她是在嘲讽我吗？

translation.en: Suppose what she meant was, money can't buy what we have.
translation.zh:
我想她的意思是金钱
买不到我们所拥有的东西

translation.en: Didn't you used to go out with her?
translation.zh: 你以前不是和她约会过吗？

translation.en: No, love. That was Kevin.
translation.zh: 不 亲爱的 那是凯文

translation.en: He had this big thing for her.
translation.zh: 他喜欢过她

translation.en: Oh, and you didn't?
translation.zh:
-你没有吗？
-没有

translation.en: No, not like me and you, love at first sight.
translation.zh:
-你没有吗？
-没有 -不像我对你一见钟情
-是嘛

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh:
-不像我对你一见钟情
-是嘛

translation.en: I remember that night. You was with your mate Audrey at that disco.
translation.zh:
我记得那天晚上
你和你的朋友奥德丽在迪斯科舞厅

translation.en: Saw this gorgeous, little bum in a pencil skirt.
translation.zh: 看到那个穿铅笔裙的漂亮女孩

translation.en: Thought, "I've got to have that."
translation.zh: 我就想着“她一定要属于我”

translation.en: But Audrey, she already had a bloke, so I called you.
translation.zh:
但奥德丽已经有男朋友了
所以我就拉走了你

translation.en: Cheeky sod.
translation.zh:
-油嘴滑舌
-爸爸！

translation.en: Daddy, come and dance with me.
translation.zh:
-油嘴滑舌
-爸爸！ 爸爸 来跟我跳舞吧

translation.en: Come on, Dad.
translation.zh: 来嘛 爸爸！

translation.en: [Kevin] Chin. Piss off, Kevin.
translation.zh:
-我要拍了
-拿开 凯文

translation.en: Good morning.
translation.zh: 早上好

translation.en: I'd like to access my safe deposit box, please--
translation.zh: 我想打开我的保险箱

translation.en: Martine love, L-O-V-E.
translation.zh: 玛汀洛夫

translation.en: Certainly, madam.
translation.zh: 好的 女士

translation.en: [Lew] Taxi!
translation.zh: 出租车！

translation.en: -You're an actor, right? -That's right.
translation.zh:
-你是个演员 对吧？
-没错

translation.en: I did a couple of films for you, Mr. Vogel.
translation.zh: 我为你拍过几部片子 沃格尔先生

translation.en: Yeah, right.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: So, what were these films you were in?
translation.zh: 你都演了些什么片子啊？

translation.en: -Oh, forget about it. -Go on.
translation.zh:
-别提了
-说说吧

translation.en: Technically, it's what you call pornography.
translation.zh: 严格来说是人们所谓的… 色情片

translation.en: -You're joking. -No.
translation.zh:
-开玩笑吧
-没有

translation.en: So, you've been going around town with a 12-inch mutton dagger
translation.zh: 所以你随身带着30厘米的“武器”

translation.en: hanging down your pants?
translation.zh: 四处闲逛吗？

translation.en: That's nothing to be ashamed of.
translation.zh: 那又不是什么丢人的事

translation.en: Nice.
translation.zh: 真不错

translation.en: Fake. Got a posh party at the weekend.
translation.zh: 假的 周末有个豪华派对

translation.en: This is the one. The lease is available.
translation.zh: （炸鸡店） 就是这儿了 租约已经生效了

translation.en: Finally. How do I look? Good?
translation.zh:
终于好了 -我看起来怎么样？帅吗？
-不是你的最佳状态 戴夫

translation.en: Not your best, Dave.
translation.zh:
-我看起来怎么样？帅吗？
-不是你的最佳状态 戴夫

translation.en: [Martine] Here we go.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: So how come you got the inside dope on this place, Martine?
translation.zh: 你是怎么搞到内部消息的 玛汀？

translation.en: She knows this bloke. Runs a security company.
translation.zh: 她交往了一个开安保公司的男人

translation.en: Bloke? Is it serious? You getting married?
translation.zh: 交往？认真的吗？你们会结婚吗？

translation.en: He is married. All the best ones are.
translation.zh: 他已经结婚了 好男人都是已婚

translation.en: Here we go. Marylebone Road and Baker Street.
translation.zh: 聊正题吧 马里波恩路和贝克街

translation.en: On the corner here is the bank.
translation.zh: 银行就在拐角

translation.en: Next door is the Chicken Inn, and at 189, Le Sac.
translation.zh:
隔壁是一家炸鸡店
和189号的勒萨克商店

translation.en: In the back here is an underground car park
translation.zh: 后面是一个地下停车场

translation.en: with direct access to the shops' basements.
translation.zh: 可以直接通往商店的地下室

translation.en: We can pull in here from Glentworth Street
translation.zh: 我们可以从格伦特沃斯街把车开进去

translation.en: into the car park for drop-offs and pickups
translation.zh: 在停车场装卸

translation.en: without being seen from the street.
translation.zh: 不会被街上的人看到

translation.en: We'll dig a tunnel from the basement of the shop
translation.zh: 我们从商店的地下室挖一条隧道

translation.en: under the Chicken inn and pop up in the safe deposit vault.
translation.zh:
到炸鸡店下方
然后就可以闯进保险箱库房

translation.en: I got a question.
translation.zh: 我有个问题

translation.en: What do us lot know about digging tunnels?
translation.zh: 我们懂挖隧道吗？

translation.en: Nothing, but I know a man who does.
translation.zh: 不懂 但我认识一个懂的人

translation.en: So, what do you reckon, Bambas?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样 班巴斯？

translation.en: What do I reckon?
translation.zh: 我觉得怎么样？

translation.en: I reckon I know you guys,
translation.zh: 我觉得我认识你们

translation.en: but I don't know her.
translation.zh: 但我不认识她

translation.en: Don't worry about Martine. She's solid.
translation.zh: 别担心玛汀 她可以信任

translation.en: We go way back.
translation.zh: 我们是老熟人了

translation.en: Terry, you have been up to some mischief in your time,
translation.zh: 特里 你这辈子干过不少坏事

translation.en: but this-- this is serious shit, my friend.
translation.zh: 但这不是一般的小事情 朋友

translation.en: Don't you think it's a little out of your league?
translation.zh: 不觉得有点超出能力范围吗？

translation.en: Maybe it's time we stepped up to the first division.
translation.zh: 也许正是时候升级自己呢

translation.en: There's going to be reinforce concrete under the vault.
translation.zh: 地下室下面会有钢筋混凝土

translation.en: We're going to need a thermic lance, a jackhammer,
translation.zh: 需要热喷枪 手提钻

translation.en: a generator, lights, ropes, cables-- The works.
translation.zh:
发电机 照明 绳子
电缆 全套的设备

translation.en: It's about 40 feet of digging before we're under the bank.
translation.zh: 大概要挖12米才能到银行底下

translation.en: We could hire some micks from Camden Tower to do the digging.
translation.zh: 我们可以从卡姆登镇雇几个人来挖

translation.en: That's brilliant, Dave.
translation.zh: 你可真聪明 戴夫

translation.en: Why don't we just pay their national insurance contributions,
translation.zh: 不如我们再给他们缴纳国民保险？

translation.en: and then you won't have to get dirt on your Tommy Nutter suit.
translation.zh:
这样你的汤米纳特西装
就不用被弄脏了

translation.en: This way, Michael. One more shot. This way.
translation.zh: 请看这边 迈克 再拍一张 看这边

translation.en: Thank you. That's great.
translation.zh: 谢谢 好极了

translation.en: What are your plans?
translation.zh: 你有什么计划？

translation.en: I am returning to Trinidad
translation.zh: 我要回到特立尼达去

translation.en: to liberate my brothers and sisters
translation.zh: 把我的兄弟姐妹

translation.en: from the enslavement of the British colonialists.
translation.zh: 从英国殖民主义者的奴役中解放出来

translation.en: What about the charges you are facing?
translation.zh: 那些对你提出的控诉呢？

translation.en: How can you leave England? They are liars and cowards.
translation.zh:
-你怎么能离开英国？
-他们都是骗子 懦夫

translation.en: If they had anything against me but their fear of me,
translation.zh:
如果除了对我的恐惧之外
他们能拿出任何证据

translation.en: I'd be tried and jailed.
translation.zh: 那我已经被审判入狱了

translation.en: See you tonight. [Martine] We're going to need a front man on this,
translation.zh:
-再见 班巴
-我们需要一个明面上的人

translation.en: someone who can sign the lease on the shop and look for business.
translation.zh: 他来租下店面做生意

translation.en: I know someone-- Guy Singer.
translation.zh: 我认识一个叫盖伊申纳的人

translation.en: Calls himself The Major.
translation.zh: 我认识一个叫盖伊申纳的人 自称“上校” 那完全是胡吹

translation.en: Has a lot of bollocks, and he's got this right posh accent
translation.zh: 自称“上校” 那完全是胡吹 但要是有人问起

translation.en: if anyone comes nosing about.
translation.zh: 但要是有人问起 他的优雅口音很能糊弄人 （琼斯乔克和道森服装店）

translation.en: A bit tight under the arms, don't you think?
translation.zh: 腋下有点紧 不觉得吗？

translation.en: Traditional fit, sir.
translation.zh: 这是传统款 先生

translation.en: If one can't raise one's hands above one's head,
translation.zh: 如果一个人不能把手举过头顶

translation.en: it tends to inhibit any impulsive acts of surrender.
translation.zh: 如果一个人不能把手举过头顶 他就会抑制住投降的冲动

translation.en: I'll be right back, sir.
translation.zh: 我马上就回来 先生

translation.en: What on Earth are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你来这里做什么？

translation.en: Got a bit of business for you, Guy.
translation.zh: 给你找了点事做 盖伊

translation.en: You might be tempted.
translation.zh: 你可能会感兴趣

translation.en: Sit down, love.
translation.zh: 坐下 亲爱的

translation.en: What do you think you're doing?
translation.zh: 你们想做什么？

translation.en: Taking the "E" for a test drive.
translation.zh: 试开一下车

translation.en: Tell your boss he can have his inventory back
translation.zh: 告诉你老板 想要回来的话

translation.en: when he settles Mr. Jessell's debt,
translation.zh: 告诉你老板 想要回来的话 就先把钱还给杰塞尔先生

translation.en: and it better be soon, or we'll be back
translation.zh: 还有最好早点儿

translation.en: to tap Terry's knee caps.
translation.zh: 否则我们就要敲碎特里的膝盖骨了

translation.en: If I was you two, I'd be looking for another job.
translation.zh: 如果我是你们 我会找份新工作

translation.en: Lovely. Cheers.
translation.zh: 真好

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh:
-干杯
-干杯

translation.en: So come on, then. What don't I know?
translation.zh: 那就说吧 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Romantic dinner on a Monday night?
translation.zh: 周一晚上的浪漫晚餐？

translation.en: Look, honey, uh…
translation.zh: 听着 亲爱的…

translation.en: I'm gonna be working some strange hours over the next week or two, so…
translation.zh:
接下来的一两个星期
我的工作时间会很奇怪

translation.en: Don't ask me what I'm doing, because I don't want to lie to you.
translation.zh: 别问我在做什么 因为我不想骗你

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你要做什么？

translation.en: Look, I know I've caused us a few problems
translation.zh: 我知道我给我们带来了一些麻烦

translation.en: with those cars that aren't selling.
translation.zh: 但那些车卖不出去

translation.en: All I was trying to do was get out of the game.
translation.zh: 我要做的就是解决这些麻烦

translation.en: This thing is gonna put us there. Will it?
translation.zh:
-我要做的事情会帮助我们
-是吗？

translation.en: Yeah. In a better place.
translation.zh: 是的 我们可以去个更好的地方

translation.en: It's for all of us,
translation.zh: 这是为了我们

translation.en: for you and the kids.
translation.zh: 为了你和孩子们

translation.en: And how afraid do I have to be, Terry?
translation.zh: 那我需要有多担心 特里？

translation.en: Maybe it would be a smart thing if you went and stayed with your aunt,
translation.zh: 也许你们最好去和阿姨住在一起

translation.en: in case things turn to custard.
translation.zh: 以防事情变糟

translation.en: So we are settled. Twenty-five percent to run my girls till I return from Trinidad.
translation.zh:
在我从特立尼达回来之前
四分之一的利润归你 而你照看好姑娘们的生意

translation.en: It's all right. You don't have to worry.
translation.zh: 没问题 你不需要担心

translation.en: I'll look after your little flock of birds like they were my own.
translation.zh: 我会像照顾自己的孩子一样照顾她们

translation.en: So long as you remember they are not your own.
translation.zh: 但要记住她们不属于你

translation.en: Lew, while I'm back in Trinidad,
translation.zh: 卢 等我回到特立尼达

我认为毒品是这个国家
年轻人道德败坏的罪魁祸首

translation.en: You should think about it.

translation.en: With these goodies, you could make a lot of dough,

translation.en: especially with the police in your pocket.

translation.en: but probably not as much as you're donating

translation.en: to be permitted to leave our fair shores.

translation.en: Not a shilling. I have something so special,

translation.en: I don't need to pay anyone.

translation.en: And what would that be, Michael?

translation.en: Sorry, Lew.

translation.en: Well, whatever it is, you crafty bugger,
translation.zh:
好吧 不管它是什么 你这个狡猾的家伙
我希望你能保护好它

translation.en: I hope you're keeping it safe.
translation.zh:
不管它是什么 你这个狡猾的家伙
我希望你能保护好它

translation.en: Yes, as safe as it can be, in the place that you recommended.
translation.zh: 当然 在你推荐的地方它非常安全

translation.en: You're late.
translation.zh:
-你迟到了
-抱歉

translation.en: This is the Major-- Major Guy Singer,

translation.en: the final member of our team.
translation.zh: 我们团队的最后一员

translation.en: I don't know this man. Who are you?
translation.zh:
我不认识这个人 -你是谁？
-与你无关

translation.en: None of your business.
translation.zh:
-你是谁？
-与你无关

translation.en: No secrets around here. The Major's a con artist.
translation.zh: 这里没有秘密 上校是个骗子

translation.en: Usually elderly widows.
translation.zh: 通常是对年迈寡妇下手

translation.en: There's no need to bring that up.
translation.zh: 没必要说这么多

translation.en: Now he's the official new owner of Le Sac.
translation.zh: 现在他是勒萨克商店的新老板

translation.en: Handbags and leather accessories for the discerning lady.
translation.zh:
现在他是勒萨克商店的新老板 专卖为眼光独到女士
设计的手袋和皮革配饰

translation.en: Nice.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: I told the district planner's office about the remodeling.
translation.zh: 我告诉了规划局这里需要重新装修

translation.en: They gave me the specs for the sewage, drainage,
translation.zh: 他们给了我上下水

translation.en: gas, and power lines.

translation.en: We'll have to go deep to miss that lot.
translation.zh: 我们要挖深点避开它们

translation.en: What's this for? That is the thermic lance.
translation.zh:
-这是做什么的？
-那是热喷枪

translation.en: It cuts through concrete and metal.
translation.zh: 它能切开混凝土和金属

translation.en: We're doing this, hey? I mean, we're bloody going for it.
translation.zh: 我们要开始了 是吧？ 我是说我们已经准备好开始了

translation.en: Let's see what this thing can do. Good idea, Kev.
translation.zh:
-看看这东西能怎么用
-好主意 凯文

translation.en: Give us a demonstration, Bambas.
translation.zh: 示范一下吧 班巴

translation.en: Ok. Hold this. Hold it. Here.
translation.zh: 拿着这个吧 像这样

translation.en: Kevin, go stand over there by the oxygen.
translation.zh: 凯文 去氧气管那边

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Shut it off!
translation.zh:
-把它关了！
-快关了！

translation.en: Off! Off! Off!
translation.zh:
-快关！
-关了它！

translation.en: Knock off!
translation.zh: 真是疯了！

translation.en: They know what they're doing, these people, do they?
translation.zh: 那些人清楚自己在做什么 对吧？

translation.en: Oh, absolutely. Professional criminals.
translation.zh: 那些人清楚自己在做什么 对吧？ 绝对的 专业的罪犯

translation.en: What's the worst-case scenario?
translation.zh: 最糟的情况是什么？

translation.en: They get caught and go to jail. No possible connection to us.
translation.zh:
他们被抓然后坐牢
和我们没有一点关系

translation.en: What about this model you're screwing?
translation.zh: 你搞上的那个模特呢？

translation.en: What promises have you made to keep her in line?
translation.zh: 你做了什么保证让她乖乖听话？

translation.en: None that can't be broken.
translation.zh: 没什么绝对保证

translation.en: Look, she's our only tie to the bank operation.
translation.zh:
听着
她是我们和银行行动的唯一联系

translation.en: If things do go belly up, it'll only take one cut to sever the knot.
translation.zh:
听着
她是我们和银行行动的唯一联系 如果事情真的搞砸了 只需要一刀就能切断绳结

translation.en: What's Gale Benson up to?
translation.zh: 盖尔本森在做什么？

translation.en: I believe she's working her way
translation.zh:
我相信她正在设法进入
迈克艾克斯的秘密世界

translation.en: into Michael X's inner sanctum.
translation.zh:
我相信她正在设法进入
迈克艾克斯的秘密世界 请在我的书上签名好吗？

translation.en: [woman] Could you sign my book, please?
translation.zh:
请在我的书上签名好吗？ （哈基姆贾马尔
《生死一线》）

translation.en: Daddy!
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: I am so glad you decided to come.
translation.zh: 我真高兴你能来

translation.en: This is my father. [indistinct]
translation.zh: 这是我父亲 莱纳德普拉格爵士

translation.en: Always happy to meet Gale's new friends.

translation.en: Her new name is Hale Kimga.
translation.zh: 她的新名字是哈尔基姆盖

translation.en: It's an anagram of the letters of our names. Hakim and Gale.
translation.zh: 它是我们名字的变位 哈基姆和盖尔

translation.en: And your name is?
translation.zh:
-你的名字是？
-哈基姆

translation.en: Hakim. Hakim Jamal.
translation.zh:
-你的名字是？
-哈基姆 -哈基姆贾马尔
-好的

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh:
-哈基姆贾马尔
-好的

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 借过一下

translation.en: Hello, gorgeous.
translation.zh: 嗨 美女

translation.en: So where's the author?
translation.zh: 作者在哪儿？

translation.en: He's over there, signing his masterpiece.
translation.zh: 他在那边为他的作品签名呢

translation.en: Well, you better drop by the house this weekend
translation.zh: 不如你们这周末回家坐坐

translation.en: and introduce Mr. Jamal to mother.

translation.en: Sorry, Daddy, can't do that.
translation.zh: 抱歉 爸爸 这周去不了

translation.en: We're popping on down to the islands for a while.
translation.zh: 我们要去岛上待一段时间

translation.en: Let me get you a drink.
translation.zh: 我帮你拿点儿喝的吧

translation.en: Good luck with your book.
translation.zh: 祝你的书大卖

translation.en: So have you read this book of his?
translation.zh: 你看过他的书了吗？

translation.en: You must be joking.
translation.zh:
-你是在开玩笑
-没错

translation.en: Right. You're probably under cover,
translation.zh:
-你是在开玩笑
-没错 你可能是在卧底

translation.en: spying on Black power's insidious threat to the British way of life.
translation.zh:
监视黑人势力
对英国生活方式的潜在威胁

translation.en: That's very funny.
translation.zh: 这说法真有趣

translation.en: Tell me, is our little enterprise still shipshape?
translation.zh: 说说吧 我们的事儿还顺利吗？

translation.en: We're currently on schedule, Tim.
translation.zh: 正在按计划进行 提姆

translation.en: We're taking over the shop on Friday afternoon.
translation.zh: 我们会在星期五下午接管那家商店

translation.en: I know if this stuffs up, I'm in poo-poo land.
translation.zh: 我知道如果搞砸 我就完蛋了

translation.en: We have a blue transit van just pulled up.
translation.zh: 刚刚停下了一辆蓝色运货车 上边写着“克拉西装修”

translation.en: "Clacy Builders" on the side.
translation.zh: 上边写着“克拉西装修”

translation.en: And we have one man entering the shop.
translation.zh: 一个男人进了店里

translation.en: Construction crew for Le Sac.
translation.zh: 勒萨克商店的施工队

translation.en: I got a question.
translation.zh: 我有个问题

translation.en: What do we do with all the dirt we're gonna dig out of the hole?

translation.en: It's all been worked out, Dave.
translation.zh: 那已经安排好了 戴夫

translation.en: We'll dig another hole in that corner over there
translation.zh:
我们在那个角落再挖一个洞
然后把土倒进去

translation.en: and put it in that. Over.
translation.zh:
我们在那个角落再挖一个洞
然后把土倒进去 完毕

translation.en: [Martine] If we're to get the job done
translation.zh:
如果我们想在
周一早上银行开门前完成

translation.en: before the bank opens on Monday morning, we better get a rig along.
translation.zh:
如果我们想在
周一早上银行开门前完成 -那最好赶紧开始
-动工仪式感兴趣吗 玛汀？

translation.en: Want to do the honors, Martine?
translation.zh:
-那最好赶紧开始
-动工仪式感兴趣吗 玛汀？

translation.en: This is it. Here we go.
translation.zh: 很好 那就开始了

translation.en: Watch your nouns, Martine.

translation.en: -Yeah! -[applause]
[Bambas] Let's get this show on the road.
translation.zh: 让我们大闹一场吧

translation.en: Some racket, eh, Ralph?
translation.zh: 这也太吵了吧

translation.en: Bloody hell. What's going on?
translation.zh: 搞什么！这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Kev.
translation.zh: 凯文

translation.en: Dave, come on, mate.
translation.zh: 戴夫 快点

translation.en: Dave, you need a break.
translation.zh: 戴夫 你需要休息一下

translation.en: I'll take over. Cheers, Major.
translation.zh:
-换我来吧
-谢了 上校

translation.en: Heads up.
translation.zh: 小心头！

translation.en: Where's Dave?
translation.zh: 戴夫呢？

translation.en: No idea.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: Where did you get to? Just checking the door was locked.
translation.zh:
-你去哪儿了？
-去检查下门锁没锁

translation.en: Of course it's locked, Dave.
translation.zh: 当然锁了 戴夫

translation.en: I locked it.
translation.zh: 我锁的

translation.en: Hang on. What have we got here?

translation.en: Is this a cop or what?

translation.en: Christ, he's not going in there, is he?
translation.zh: 老天 他不会要进去吧？

translation.en: I'll go. Dave!
translation.zh:
-我去吧
-该死！戴夫 回来

translation.en: Stop! Hold it down! Someone's knocking.
translation.zh: 停下！有人敲门

translation.en: Stop! There's somebody at the door of the shop.
translation.zh:
停下！有人在敲店门！ -有人…
-班巴斯！

translation.en: Bambas! Hold on!
translation.zh: 班巴斯！等下

translation.en: There's somebody at the door.
translation.zh: 有人敲门

translation.en: Why aren't I going? It's my job.
translation.zh:
-我可以去应门
-那是我的工作

translation.en: [whispering] Coppers! [whispering] It's the Old Bill.
translation.zh:
-警察
-是警察！

translation.en: Good evening. You're working late.
translation.zh: 晚上好 这么晚还在工作啊

translation.en: Around the clock, officer.
translation.zh: 简直不分昼夜 警官

translation.en: Expanding our storage. Trying to complete renovations for the grand--
translation.zh: 扩展我们的仓库为了…

translation.en: If you don't mind, sir.
translation.zh: 可以让让吗 先生

translation.en: Excuse me!
translation.zh: 打扰一下！

translation.en: Are you using a jackhammer down there?
translation.zh: 下面在用手提钻吗？

translation.en: Yeah. You had some complaints, officer?
translation.zh: 是的 有投诉吗 警官？

translation.en: Yes, from some of your neighbors.
translation.zh: 是的 来自这边的邻居们

translation.en: We'll try to keep it down, all right?
translation.zh: 我们尽量小声点 好吗？

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I wonder how they talked their way out of that one.
translation.zh: 想知道他们是怎么说的

translation.en: Tim, Quinn here.
translation.zh: 提姆 我是奎恩

translation.en: We just had a copper go into the shop.
translation.zh: 刚才有个警察进了那家商店

translation.en: [Quinn] I'm not sure why. He's gone now.
translation.zh: 不知道去做什么 现在已经走了

translation.en: Uh, all clear.
translation.zh: 没问题了

translation.en: We need a lookout-- Someone on a roof somewhere.
translation.zh:
我们得派人把风
在上面找个地方盯着

translation.en: We've got the walkie-talkies.
translation.zh:
-我们有无线电对讲机
-艾迪怎么样？

translation.en: What about Eddie? He's a good lad. We can trust him.
translation.zh:
-我们有无线电对讲机
-艾迪怎么样？ -他人不错 可以信任他
-不行

translation.en: No. Look, we're not cutting anyone else in.
translation.zh:
-他人不错 可以信任他
-不行 听着 我们不能再让别人入伙了

translation.en: We won't cut him in on the loot. Give him the car lot.
translation.zh: 不需要他入伙 把车行给他就行

translation.en: Hopefully I won't need that headache anymore.
translation.zh: 希望我不需要再头疼了

translation.en: -[Major] My God. -Get up there, Major.
translation.zh:
-天啊 别来了
-上去吧 上校

translation.en: [Dave] Cover that up!
translation.zh: 把它盖上

translation.en: It's not the coppers.
translation.zh: 不是警察

translation.en: Yes. Can I help you? Delivery for Dave Shilling.
translation.zh:
-你好 有什么事吗？
-戴夫希林的外卖

translation.en: What is it? Chicken and chips.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-鸡肉和薯条

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: 知道了

translation.en: Take-away for Mr. Shilling. Thanks.
translation.zh:
-希林先生的外卖
-谢谢

translation.en: You can't be serious.
translation.zh: 你是认真的吗？

translation.en: I was starving.
translation.zh: 我要饿死了

translation.en: [mechanical voice] Mind the gap.
translation.zh: 小心站台空隙 （贝克街）

translation.en: Radio's in the bag. Binocs as well.
translation.zh: 无线电在包里 还有望远镜

translation.en: There's a Betsy on the top floor of this building.
translation.zh: 这栋楼的顶层有个小屋

translation.en: He'll pay for the wink.
translation.zh: 一周的费用都付了

translation.en: The ladder will get you to the roof.
translation.zh: 有梯子可以上去

translation.en: You're in from Liverpool looking for work.
translation.zh: 你从利物浦来找工作的

translation.en: I don't have a Liverpool accent.
translation.zh: 你从利物浦来找工作的 可我没有利物浦口音

translation.en: Then don't talk to anyone, Eddie.
translation.zh: 那就不要和任何人交谈 艾迪

translation.en: I'm up on the roof, and I got a good view, all directions. Over
translation.zh: 我在这楼顶上 各个方向都能看得很清楚 完毕

translation.en: Are you in position, Night Jar? Commander HQ here. Acknowledge.
translation.zh: 就位了吗 夜鹰？ 这里是指挥总部 请确认

translation.en: Yeah, I'm in position.
translation.zh: 是的 我已就位

translation.en: I can see the front of the bank and Marylebone Road.
translation.zh: 我能看到银行前门 马里波恩路

translation.en: Baker Street. I can see everything really well.
translation.zh: 贝克街 各方都一目了然

translation.en: All clear on the western front, Guy. Over.
translation.zh: 西线很安全 盖伊 完毕

translation.en: No names, Eddie. Sorry, Dave.
translation.zh:
-不要提名字 艾迪
-抱歉 戴夫

translation.en: Hey, you delinquents. What have I told you?
translation.zh: 你们这群白痴 我说什么了？

translation.en: No idle chitchat.
translation.zh: 不要闲聊

translation.en: Sorry-- over.
translation.zh: 抱歉 完毕

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 见鬼了

translation.en: Wakey wakey, gentlemen. I'll keep an eye on the shop from here on.
translation.zh: 醒醒 先生们 从现在起我来监视商店

translation.en: You two go around to Glentworth Street.
translation.zh: 你们俩绕到格伦沃斯街

translation.en: Cover the parking garage exit.
translation.zh: 守住停车场出口

translation.en: Ok.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Night Jar here. There's some fellow looking through the window.
translation.zh: 夜鹰报告 有人从窗户往里看

translation.en: Uh-- oh. Hang on.
translation.zh: 等下

translation.en: Wait. Hang on. He's going. He's going.
translation.zh: 等等 他走了

translation.en: Yeah, he's gone. Over.
translation.zh: 他已经走了 完毕

translation.en: Um, Roger, Night Jar. Over and out.
translation.zh: 收到 夜鹰 完毕

translation.en: I'm gonna go to the pub, grab some more smokes.
translation.zh: 我要去酒吧 再抽几根烟

translation.en: Do you want anything?
translation.zh: 你要点什么吗？

translation.en: Ooh. Uh, pack of Seniors.
translation.zh: 来包海军

translation.en: There you go, sir.
translation.zh:
-给你 先生
-是啊

translation.en: Two packets of Rothmans. Two Senior Service, and eight bags of crisps.
translation.zh:
两包乐福门 两包海军 -还要八袋薯片
-好的

translation.en: Hello, gorgeous. Are we still on track?
translation.zh: 嗨 美女 还顺利吗？

translation.en: We had a scare last night. The cops came around.
translation.zh: 昨晚吓了一跳 有个警察进来了

translation.en: Can't you pull rank and make sure it doesn't happen again?
translation.zh:
你就不能安排一下
确保这种事不再发生吗？

translation.en: No. We can't show our hand. We're invisible, remember?
translation.zh:
不行 我们不能插手
我们要隐身幕后 记得吗？

translation.en: Wish I was. What about your friend Terry?
translation.zh:
-希望我也可以
-你的朋友特里呢？

translation.en: Where's he planning to carve up the proceeds?
translation.zh: 他打算把东西弄到哪儿去？

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Pint here, chief? What's wrong?
translation.zh:
-给我来一杯
-怎么了？

translation.en: I'm here to take a break.
translation.zh: 我得出来喘口气

translation.en: Who's that you was talking to?
translation.zh: 你在跟谁说话？

translation.en: I wasn't. He was trying to chat me up.
translation.zh: 没有 只是个搭讪的

translation.en: It does happen, you know.
translation.zh: 这种事儿常有 你知道的

translation.en: Right. [man] There you are.
translation.zh:
-是啊
-这里是你的

translation.en: Cheers. Keep the change.
translation.zh:
-谢谢 不用找了
-谢谢

translation.en: What are you doing here? You following me?
translation.zh:
话说回来你在这里做什么？
跟踪我吗？

translation.en: No. Just wanted a pint.
translation.zh: 没有 只是想喝一杯

translation.en: Then enjoy it.
translation.zh: 那就好好享用吧

translation.en: Hello, Gale. Where have you been?
translation.zh:
-嗨 盖尔
-你去哪儿了？

translation.en: You're rather impressed with our friend Hakim, aren't you?
translation.zh:
你对我们的朋友
哈基姆印象很好 是吧？

translation.en: I know, rule number one, don't get emotionally involved.
translation.zh: 我知道 纪律第一条 不得牵扯私人感情

translation.en: It doesn't mean I can't enjoy my work.
translation.zh: 但那不代表我不能享受工作

translation.en: You certainly do.
translation.zh: 看你的确乐在其中

translation.en: What does your father think of your consorting with these radicals, anyway?
translation.zh:
你父亲对你和这些
激进分子来往有什么看法？

translation.en: We are not amused.
translation.zh: 并不太开心

translation.en: Of course, if he knew what I was really up to,
