无所谓了 戴夫
把东西都装进袋子里 我们走

translation.en: That's right. Let's move. Come on!
translation.zh: 他说得对 我们走 快点！

translation.en: No. There's nothing here, Sarge.
translation.zh:
-没有
-没有消息 警长

translation.en: Are you sure?
translation.zh: 确定吗？

translation.en: There's no mention of the ambulance.
translation.zh: 没有提到救护车

translation.en: Nothing. Move on, Sierra Lima Two.
translation.zh: 没有 那就走吧 二号车

translation.en: That's them, finally.
translation.zh:
-那是他们
-终于出来了

translation.en: Come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 快点 开车

translation.en: The van is leaving. We will follow them. Over.
translation.zh: 货车开出来了 我们马上跟上 完毕

translation.en: Stop them as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 尽快拦下他们

translation.en: Open the door!
translation.zh: 开门！

translation.en: What have I done, governor?
translation.zh: 我做什么了 警官？

translation.en: Open the back door. Come on.
translation.zh: 打开后门 快点

translation.en: Some fellow paid me 50 quid to pick up his van
translation.zh: 有人给了我50英镑让我去取这货车

translation.en: and drop in front of the airport.
translation.zh: 然后把车停在希斯罗机场

translation.en: Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Change of plan. Precautionary measure.
translation.zh:
-货车去哪儿了？
-计划有变 预防万一

translation.en: I've organized alternative transport.
translation.zh: 我安排了其他交通工具

translation.en: None of us have met your boyfriend,
translation.zh:
-为什么？
-我们都没见过你男朋友

translation.en: the alarm bloke who clued you up about the job.
translation.zh: 那个给你提供内幕消息的安保老板

translation.en: He could have set us up.
translation.zh: 可能是给我们下套

translation.en: We bloody well pulled it off!
translation.zh: 我们成功了

translation.en: Done with military precision, eh, Major?
translation.zh: 少校 像军队一样精准 是吧？

translation.en: Now that I'm fiscally secure, I think I'll promote myself to colonel.
translation.zh:
既然已经安全脱身
我想我要晋升自己为“上校”

translation.en: [Dave] Hey, do you know what I'm gonna do?
translation.zh: 知道我要做什么吗？

translation.en: Buy me mum a new house, something with a garden.
translation.zh: 给我妈妈买栋新房子 带花园的那种

translation.en: I thought you'd be off to Copenhagen, Dave.
translation.zh: 我以为你要去哥本哈根 戴夫

translation.en: Why would I go to Copenhagen? Have your cock shortened.
translation.zh:
-我为什么要去哥本哈根？
-缩短你的老二

translation.en: Yeah, well, maybe what they chop off of mine,
translation.zh: 好吧 也许他们可以切掉我一部分

translation.en: they can add on to your little pinky.
translation.zh: 加到你那上面

translation.en: How'd you find this place, Terry?
translation.zh: 你是怎么找到这地方的 特里？

translation.en: A bloke I know used to run a chop shop here.
translation.zh:
认识的一个家伙
以前在这开了家拆车厂

translation.en: He's in the nick now.
translation.zh: 他现在在牢里

translation.en: How could you lose control of the operation?
translation.zh: 行动怎么会失控？

translation.en: I thought you were on top of this thing?
translation.zh: 我以为你已经搞定了

translation.en: Sir, it worked. They did the job. They robbed the vault.
translation.zh:
长官 行动成功了
他们完成了工作 抢了保险库

translation.en: And we have no idea where the fuck they are.
translation.zh: 但我们不知道他们现在在哪儿

translation.en: Do you know, an ugly thought has just occurred.
translation.zh: 知道吗 我刚刚有了个可怕的猜想

translation.en: Lots of money in that vault, jewelry, money, bonds.
translation.zh: 那保险库里有那么多钱 珠宝 债券

translation.en: You and your sweetie haven't cooked up something between you, I hope.
translation.zh:
我希望你和你的情人之间
没有什么小打算

translation.en: You think I'd betray you? There are precedents.
translation.zh:
-你觉得我会背叛你？
-不是没有过先例

translation.en: Two of our former colleagues now live in bloody Moscow.
translation.zh: 有两个前同事现在就在该死的莫斯科

translation.en: Let's hope they don't have another bidder.
translation.zh: 希望他们没有其他买家吧

translation.en: She won't cross us. She knows what we're capable of.
translation.zh: 她不会背叛我们 她知道我们的本事

translation.en: How does she even know who the hell we are?
translation.zh: 她怎么会知道我们的身份？

translation.en: I'm sure she'll contact me when she comes to her senses.
translation.zh: 等她回过神来肯定会联系我

translation.en: Going anywhere else would be a death sentence.
translation.zh: 否则就相当于自寻死路

translation.en: You'd better hope she does, Everett.
translation.zh: 最好祈祷她会这么想 埃弗雷特

translation.en: Or it may be yours.
translation.zh: 不然自寻死路的恐怕就是你了

translation.en: Here you go, Bambas, this is your lot.
translation.zh: 来吧 班巴斯 这是你的那份

translation.en: "Never washed after our magic moment." Snow King.
translation.zh: “美妙时刻后就再没洗过 斯努基”

translation.en: Hey, Dave, look at this.
translation.zh: 戴夫 看这个

translation.en: I've seen this bloke on the TV.
translation.zh: 我在电视上看过这家伙

translation.en: The old perve.
translation.zh: 老变态！

translation.en: I've seen this face before.
translation.zh: 我见过这张脸 他是国会议员

translation.en: He's an M.P. Lord, uh, what's his name.
translation.zh: 我见过这张脸 他是国会议员 他叫什么名字来着？

translation.en: You know, always wears those fancy bowties.
translation.zh: 他叫什么名字来着？ 总是戴着那种浮夸的领结

translation.en: Not in that picture he's not.
translation.zh: 总是戴着那种浮夸的领结 这照片里可没有

translation.en: Maybe this is one of your old movies, Dave.
translation.zh: 也许这是来自你的片子 戴夫

translation.en: Piss off, Kevin.
translation.zh: 滚吧 凯文

translation.en: Timely suggestion.
translation.zh: 提个建议

translation.en: I believe I'll take my share and be on my way…
translation.zh: 我相信我会拿上我这份 赶在早上银行开门

translation.en: before the bank opens in the morning and the shit hits the proverbial fan.
translation.zh: 发现那堆烂摊子前离开

translation.en: I'm with you, Guy.
translation.zh: 我跟你一样 盖伊

translation.en: I don't have to remind you, keep a low profile.
translation.zh: 应该不用我提醒你们 保持低调

translation.en: No buying Aston Martins, Bambas.
translation.zh: 别买阿斯顿马丁 班巴斯

translation.en: The only thing I'm buying is a one-way ticket back to Cyprus.
translation.zh: 我只会买去塞浦路斯的单程票

translation.en: I'm never coming back.
translation.zh: 再也不回来了

translation.en: We should have a reunion in 20 years.
translation.zh: 我们应该在20年后重聚一次

translation.en: The Savoy Grill.
translation.zh: 萨伏伊烧烤店

translation.en: Yeah, right. Maybe for you, Guy.
translation.zh: 没错 很适合你 盖伊

translation.en: They still wouldn't let our sort in.
translation.zh: 他们还是不让我们进去

translation.en: Bye, Bam.
translation.zh: 班巴

translation.en: Good-bye, my friend. Take care of yourself, mate.
translation.zh:
-再见了 我的朋友
-照顾好自己

translation.en: Good-bye.
translation.zh: 还有少校也一样

translation.en: Be lucky.
translation.zh: 祝你幸运

translation.en: Bambas…
translation.zh: 班巴斯

translation.en: Good-bye, old chap.
translation.zh: 再见了 老伙计

translation.en: Ok, what's going on with you two. You've been staring daggers at each other
translation.zh: 好了 怎么回事？自从离开银行之后

translation.en: since you left the bank.
translation.zh: 你们俩看起来就很紧张

translation.en: Was there a lover's tiff?
translation.zh: 怎么了 情人冲突？

translation.en: I think Martine's got something to tell us.
translation.zh: 我想玛汀有些事要告诉我们

translation.en: Hang on, pal. That's Princess Margaret.
translation.zh: 等下 那是玛格丽特公主

translation.en: Fuck me.
translation.zh: 他妈的

translation.en: Where'd these come from?
translation.zh: 这些是哪来的？

translation.en: You knew the exact box this stuff was in, Martine.
translation.zh: 你知道这些就在那个保险箱里 玛汀

translation.en: You better come clean, tell us what this is really about.
translation.zh: 你最好告诉我们到底是怎么回事

translation.en: About a month ago I got busted at Heathrow on a drug charge.
translation.zh:
大约一个月前
我在希思罗机场因毒品指控被捕

translation.en: This guy I know said he'd fix it to keep me out of jail
translation.zh: 我认识一个人 他说如果我帮他个忙

translation.en: if I'd do him a favor.
translation.zh: 他就帮我免去牢狱之灾

translation.en: He knew I knew some villains.
translation.zh: 他知道我认识一些坏家伙

translation.en: He wanted to set up a robbery to get these.
translation.zh: 他想要制造一次抢劫拿走这些东西

translation.en: Fucking hell.
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: That would be the bloke you met in the Player's Club.
translation.zh: 是你在球员俱乐部见的那个家伙吗？

translation.en: Same guy you said was trying to pick you up in the club, right?
translation.zh:
也是在俱乐部
你说跟你搭讪那个人 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah. Well, so who is he?
translation.zh:
-是的
-他是谁？

translation.en: He's a guy I met in the Sombrero Club.
translation.zh: 他是我在宽边帽俱乐部认识的

translation.en: He works for some shady outfit in Whitehall.
translation.zh: 他为白厅的某个秘密组织工作

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 等等 你是说军情五处吗？

translation.en: What, you mean MI-fucking-5 or 6?
translation.zh: 等等 你是说军情五处吗？ 或者六处？

translation.en: We could get seriously nicked here, Martine.
translation.zh: 我们要陷入大麻烦了 玛汀

translation.en: No, we couldn't. All Tim wants is the contents of box 118.
translation.zh:
不 不会 提姆只想要
118号保险箱里的东西

translation.en: The deal with him is we get to keep everything else.
translation.zh: 跟他的协议是 剩下的东西都归我们

translation.en: You believe that?
translation.zh: 你相信吗？

translation.en: Put your trust in some prick we've never even met.
translation.zh:
你居然相信一个
我们素未谋面的混蛋？

translation.en: You lied to us, Martine.
translation.zh: 你骗了我们 玛汀

translation.en: We were sitting ducks right from the start.
translation.zh: 我们从一开始就是活靶子

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 真是谢谢你了

translation.en: You think it's a coincidence that you get busted for drugs
translation.zh: 你觉得你因为毒品被逮捕

translation.en: and your Tim just happens to have a plan to rob a bank?
translation.zh:
而你的提姆刚好
有抢劫银行的计划是巧合吗？

translation.en: This can work out.
translation.zh: 这事情可以解决

translation.en: We give him the photos and everything else in that box
translation.zh: 我们把照片和箱子里的东西都给他们

translation.en: and we get to keep the rest and we're free and clear.
translation.zh:
剩下的我们自己留着
然后我们也自由了

translation.en: These people aren't regular cusses, Martine.
translation.zh: 这些人不是普通花花公子 玛汀

translation.en: They're above that. They do things coppers can't.
translation.zh:
他们要狠得多
他们会做警察不能做的事情

translation.en: If they think we've seen these photos, we're as expendable as dog shit.
translation.zh:
如果他们认为我们看过这些照片
我们就死定了

translation.en: You know what? I've seen those shots.
translation.zh: 知道吗？我已经看过这些照片了

translation.en: And I know we're either dog shit or about to be dog shit.
translation.zh: 我知道我们不是死定了 就是就快死了 我要走了

translation.en: I'm out of here.
translation.zh: 就是就快死了 我要走了

translation.en: I'm not waiting for a load of spooks and coppers
translation.zh: 我可不想等着一堆特工和警察

translation.en: to come cracking my head. I'm splitting like guy and Bambas.
translation.zh:
来敲碎我的脑袋
我要像盖伊和班巴斯那样赶紧走

translation.en: It's better if we stuck together, Dave. Oh, why, Terr?
translation.zh:
-我们最好一起 戴夫
-为什么 特里？

translation.en: 'Cause we've been so truthful with each other so far? Eh?
translation.zh:
因为到目前为止
我们对彼此都很坦诚吗？

translation.en: Dave, come on.
translation.zh:
-嘿 拜托
-不 凯文 我要回家

translation.en: No. I'm going home, Kev. See me mum.
translation.zh:
-嘿 拜托
-不 凯文 我要回家 去见妈妈 然后远走高飞

translation.en: And then I'm going far away.
translation.zh: 去见妈妈 然后远走高飞

translation.en: As far as I can get away from here.
translation.zh: 有多远走多远

translation.en: We better get out of here, too.
translation.zh: 我们最好也离开这里

translation.en: In case Guy or Bambas get picked up.
translation.zh: 以防盖伊或班巴斯被抓

translation.en: Let's take the lot of this.
translation.zh: 最好把这些都拿走

translation.en: There might be something else in this shit to cause us some more grief.
translation.zh: 这破事里可能还有别的人不放过我们

translation.en: -[Terry] One of those, mate. -Here you go.
translation.zh: 一份报纸 伙计 这里 给你

translation.en: -Keep the change. -Cor, mate.
translation.zh:
-不用找了
-谢了

translation.en: Overheard our radio chat.
translation.zh: 他们无意中听到了我们的无线电

translation.en: Fucking hell…
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: "The police last night were trying to home in
translation.zh: “警察昨晚发现一起

translation.en: on the 300,000-pound bank raid."
translation.zh: 涉及三十万数额的抢劫案”

translation.en: They still don't know what bank it was.
translation.zh: 他们还不知道是哪家银行

translation.en: 300 grand?
translation.zh: 三十万？

translation.en: It was a bit more than that. More like three million.
translation.zh: 不止吧 三百万都不止

translation.en: [woman] Martine Love.
translation.zh:
-喂？
-玛汀洛夫

translation.en: Thank God. Put her through, then run a trace.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 接过来 然后追踪信号

translation.en: [Martine] It's me. What happened? Where the hell are you?
translation.zh:
-是我
-怎么回事？

translation.en: London.
translation.zh:
-你现在在哪儿？
-伦敦

translation.en: I know. Of course. I mean, where? I know what you mean.
translation.zh:
-我知道 我是说伦敦哪里？
-我知道你的意思

translation.en: -Martine, we have to meet. -I agree.
translation.zh:
-玛汀 我们得见一面
-我同意

translation.en: Why don't you come over to my place. I'll make you a cocktail.
translation.zh: 不如你来我家？我给你调鸡尾酒

translation.en: We'll have a roll in the hay for old time's sake.
translation.zh: 看在旧日情分上 我们还能滚下床单

translation.en: Oh, right, you've already been there, haven't you?
translation.zh: 对了 你已经去过了 是吧？

translation.en: Probably have your men keeping lookout for me now.
translation.zh: 可能一直在让你的人找我

translation.en: You're not in a position to play games, Martine.
translation.zh: 你没资格跟我玩游戏 玛汀

translation.en: No threats, please, Tim.
translation.zh: 请不要威胁我 提姆

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me what it was I was set up to get for you?
translation.zh:
你为什么不告诉我
你给我下了什么套呢？

translation.en: For your own good.
translation.zh: 我是为了你好

translation.en: I care about your safety, Martine.
translation.zh: 我很担心你的安全 玛汀

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I suppose I give you what you want, we go our separate ways.
translation.zh: 我给你你想要的 我们就各走各的路

translation.en: Well, that's what I promised.
translation.zh:
-那就是我的承诺
-好吧

translation.en: Ok, today, Tottenham Court Road tube.
translation.zh:
-那就是我的承诺
-好吧 今天在托特纳姆法院路站
北线 北上站台

translation.en: Northern line. North-bound platform.
translation.zh:
今天在托特纳姆法院路站
北线 北上站台

translation.en: 10:30 sharp.
translation.zh: 准时10点半

translation.en: Tottenham Court Road. 10:30.
translation.zh: 托特纳姆法院路 10点半

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: "London vaults checked after radio ham
translation.zh: “在窃听到犯罪事件后

translation.en: tunes in to a crime."
translation.zh: 伦敦各保险库被查”

translation.en: Christ, what a fiasco.
translation.zh: 天啊！真是彻底的失败！

translation.en: And now the particular bank has been identified,
translation.zh: 现在被劫银行已经确定

translation.en: the story will be all over the news.
translation.zh: 现在被劫银行已经确定 会有铺天盖地的新闻

translation.en: We've heard it already is.
translation.zh: 听说已经是了

translation.en: If we don't get onto the case quickly,
translation.zh: 如果我们不赶快解决问题

translation.en: the police will have nabbed these robbers,
translation.zh: 警察就会抓住这些劫匪

translation.en: and God knows what will happen to our photographs.
translation.zh: 天知道那些照片会怎么样

translation.en: Philip, get over to the bank.
translation.zh: 菲利普 去趟银行

translation.en: Take control of the situation.
translation.zh: 控制住局面

translation.en: Gentlemen…
translation.zh: 先生

translation.en: I've just had a conversation with one Martine Love.
translation.zh: 我刚和玛汀洛夫通话了

translation.en: Where is she?
translation.zh: 她在哪儿？

translation.en: Call was traced to a public phone box near this court.
translation.zh: 电话追踪到伯爵府的一个公用电话亭

translation.en: Good news is she's arranged to meet.
translation.zh: 好消息是 她安排了一次见面

translation.en: That is good news.
translation.zh: 的确是好消息

translation.en: [Terry] I'll be better off going alone.
translation.zh: 我一个人去比较好

translation.en: Yeah. Tim's agreed to meet.
translation.zh:
是的 -提姆同意见面了
-新闻都在播

translation.en: It's all over the news.
translation.zh:
-提姆同意见面了
-新闻都在播

translation.en: They found the location of the bank.
translation.zh: 他们找到被劫的银行了

translation.en: So what?
translation.zh: 所以呢？

translation.en: [man] Stand back.
translation.zh: （劳埃德银行） 往后站 请往后站

translation.en: [woman] Keep the change.
translation.zh: 不用找了

translation.en: I'm sorry, ma'am. You can't go in. There's been a robbery.
translation.zh:
抱歉 女士
你不能进去 这里糟抢劫了

translation.en: We know there's been a robbery. That's why we're all here.
translation.zh:
我们知道发生了抢劫案
所以我们才来这里

translation.en: [man] Everybody that works here. That means everybody. Speak to them.
translation.zh: 在这里工作的员工都去他那儿做笔录

translation.en: Gerald.
translation.zh: 杰拉德！

translation.en: You working robbery now, eh?
translation.zh: 你现在还负责抢劫案吗？

translation.en: You're a long way off your patch.
translation.zh: 你的手伸得太远了

translation.en: Regional crime squad now.
translation.zh: 我现在在地区犯罪小组

translation.en: Just dropped by to see what all the fuss was about.
translation.zh: 只是顺路过来看看是怎么个情况

translation.en: Pretty cheeky that radio bit.
translation.zh: 真好意思说啊 窃听到劫匪无线电

translation.en: These walkie-talkie robbers certainly caught your lot on the hop.
translation.zh:
那些对讲机劫匪
确实让你们措手不及吧

translation.en: Makes us all look stupid.
translation.zh: 让我们警方看起来很愚蠢

translation.en: Yeah, well, you're pretty chummy with all the villains around town.
translation.zh:
好吧 你倒是
跟城里的恶人们关系不错

translation.en: You got any idea of who could have done this?
translation.zh: 知道这是谁干的吗？

translation.en: None of my informants.
translation.zh: 反正不是我的线人

translation.en: We have been waiting here quite some time,
translation.zh: 我们已经在这里等了很长时间了

translation.en: and so far you people have told us absolutely nothing.
translation.zh: 到目前为止你们什么都没告诉我们

translation.en: If you would like to give us an itemized list
translation.zh:
如果你们能给我们
一份保险箱里东西的清单

translation.en: of the contents of your boxes, we may be able to--
translation.zh:
如果你们能给我们
一份保险箱里东西的清单 我们也许能核实…

translation.en: Are you mad?
translation.zh:
-你疯了吗？
-丢了些什么

translation.en: The whole point of having a safety deposit box
translation.zh: 开设保险箱的目的就是为了

translation.en: is so that people like you don't know what's in it.
translation.zh: 让像你这样的人不知道里面有什么

translation.en: I want to speak to a Roy Given.
translation.zh: 我找罗伊吉文

translation.en: Yeah, that's me.
translation.zh: 我就是

translation.en: This robbery's now a matter of national security.
translation.zh: 这次抢劫现在事关国家安全

translation.en: I want everybody out.
translation.zh: 我希望所有人都出去

translation.en: Well, this is a police investigation.
translation.zh: 这是警方调查

translation.en: Not anymore. Call your superiors.
translation.zh: 不再是了 打电话找你的上司吧

translation.en: Who in the bloody hell does he think he is?
translation.zh: 那家伙以为自己是谁啊？

translation.en: Spooks. Five or six-- I can never tell the difference.
translation.zh: 特工 五处或六处 看来都差不多

translation.en: They all got the same tailor
translation.zh: 都去同一家裁缝店

translation.en: and they all went to the same bloody school.
translation.zh: 上过同一所该死的学校

translation.en: Let's get some copies of the walkie-talkie tapes
translation.zh: 把对讲机的录音带复制几份

translation.en: out to the news boys.
translation.zh: 发给报童们吧

translation.en: Maybe the public can help identify the villains.
translation.zh: 也许公众可以帮助找出劫匪

translation.en: So tell me,
translation.zh: 告诉我…

translation.en: which of the boxes were ransacked?
translation.zh: 哪些箱子被洗劫了？

translation.en: The lot. 100s through to 400s.
translation.zh: 很多 从100号到400号

translation.en: Well, we're in the crapper, Jerry, both of us.
translation.zh: 麻烦了 格里 我们都有麻烦了

translation.en: Both? Well, why is it my problem?
translation.zh: 我们？关我什么事？

translation.en: Accounts have to be balanced, records kept.
translation.zh: 帐目要平衡 要有记录

translation.en: And I wouldn't likely keep the books around here, now, would I?
translation.zh: 我不会把账本放在这里 对吧？

translation.en: Spell it out, Lew. Be more specific.
translation.zh: 说清楚点 卢

translation.en: I have a ledger…
translation.zh: 我有个账簿…

translation.en: A record of every payment I've ever made to you and your colleagues.
translation.zh: 记录了我给你和你同事的每笔钱

translation.en: It was in my safety deposit box.
translation.zh: 它就在我的保险箱里

translation.en: And I think we can safely assume it's now in the possession of the robbers.
translation.zh: 我想我们可以确定它现在在劫匪手里

translation.en: Jesus wept…
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: And I think you'll agree we have to find those villains
translation.zh: 我想你也同意得赶在你的同事之前

translation.en: before your honest colleagues do.
translation.zh: 找到那些劫匪

translation.en: For fuck's sake.
translation.zh: 看在上帝的份上

translation.en: [Vogel] Lew Vogel.
translation.zh:
-谁啊？
-卢沃格尔

translation.en: Well, um…
translation.zh: 等下 起床了

translation.en: Gotta talk. Come on, wake up.
translation.zh: 等下 起床了 快点 醒醒

translation.en: What you want, Lew?
translation.zh: 什么事 卢？

translation.en: I'm afraid I've got some potentially bad news for you, Michael.
translation.zh: 恐怕我有一些坏消息要告诉你 迈克

translation.en: Your safety deposit box at the Baker Street bank,
translation.zh: 你在贝克街银行的保险箱

translation.en: what's its number? Well, why do you ask?
translation.zh:
-是多少号来着？
-为什么问起这个？

translation.en: Well, over the weekend some thieves broke into the bank vault and robbed it.
translation.zh:
上周末 一些劫匪闯入了
银行保险库 将其洗劫一空

translation.en: So if your box is in the 100-400 numbers,
translation.zh:
如果你的保险箱
在100号到400号之间

translation.en: I'm afraid all your stuff will be gone.
translation.zh: 恐怕你的东西也没了

translation.en: Mine, too, unhappily.
translation.zh: 很不幸 我的也是

translation.en: What? How can this happen in London?
translation.zh: 什么？伦敦怎么可能发生这种事？

translation.en: Well, I promise you it has happened.
translation.zh: 没办法 它就是发生了

translation.en: And I promise you these thieves will be found and dealt with.
translation.zh:
我向你保证
这些劫匪一定会被找到并处理

translation.en: You can rely on it. I'll keep you informed.
translation.zh: 相信我 有消息我再通知你

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: If anyone touches me, follows me,
translation.zh: 要是有人敢碰我 跟踪我

translation.en: Martine takes your snaps right to Fleet Street. Understood?
translation.zh:
玛汀就会带着
那些照片去舰队街 明白吗？

translation.en: You wanted box 118, Tim.
translation.zh: 你要的是118号保险箱 提姆

translation.en: You have no idea the danger you and your chums are in, do you?
translation.zh:
你根本不知道你和你的朋友们
陷入了多大危险 对吧？

translation.en: Is that right? And why would that be?
translation.zh: 是吗？为什么呢？

translation.en: You've opened Pandora's Box, you dumb prick, that's why.
translation.zh:
你已经打开了潘多拉魔盒 蠢货 -那就是原因
-我知道谁处境比较危险

translation.en: I know what's at stake.
translation.zh:
-那就是原因
-我知道谁处境比较危险

translation.en: And I know how expendable we are.
translation.zh: 我也知道我们是多么无足轻重

translation.en: So I'm changing the deal.
translation.zh:
-所以我要改变交易
-是吗？

translation.en: -Oh, is that right? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-所以我要改变交易
-是吗？ 是的 你还是会得到那些恶心照片

translation.en: You get all your nasty pictures,
translation.zh: 是的 你还是会得到那些恶心照片

translation.en: but here's the twist.
translation.zh: 但是条件变了

translation.en: We get indemnity.
translation.zh: 我们要拿到新护照

translation.en: Fresh passports, safe passage out of the country.
translation.zh: 我们要拿到新护照 所有人安全出境

translation.en: For the whole team.
translation.zh: 所有人安全出境

translation.en: And an official signed document
translation.zh: 还要一份官方签署文件

translation.en: guaranteeing we won't be prosecuted
translation.zh: 还要一份官方签署文件 保证我们不会被起诉 不会被追捕

translation.en: and we won't be pursued.
translation.zh: 保证我们不会被起诉 不会被追捕

translation.en: You can't be serious.
translation.zh: 你不是认真的吧

translation.en: You can bet your bollocks I'm serious.
translation.zh: 你可以用你的蛋蛋赌我是认真的

translation.en: And we want it signed, sealed, and delivered
translation.zh: 希望这文件由一位实权公众人物

translation.en: by a public figure of substantial authority.
translation.zh: 签字 盖章并递交

translation.en: How about the Prime Minister?
translation.zh:
-首相怎么样？
-他可以

translation.en: Yeah, he'll do if you can drag him off his yacht.
translation.zh:
-首相怎么样？
-他可以 如果你能把他从游艇上拽下来的话

translation.en: You mess with us, Tim,
translation.zh: 提姆 你要是敢耍我们

translation.en: we can drip feed pictures like this to the press.
translation.zh: 我们就会把这样的照片提供给媒体

translation.en: We've got a stack of them.
translation.zh: 反正我们有一堆

translation.en: Oh, dear.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: You've got until 4:00 p.m. to confirm we have a deal.
translation.zh: 你必须在下午4点前确认是否同意

translation.en: We'll be in touch.
translation.zh: 再联系

translation.en: Some photographs.
translation.zh: 一些照片

translation.en: Well done, Tim.
translation.zh: 干得不错 提姆

translation.en: Do you have any more?
translation.zh: 还有吗？

translation.en: Apparently there was a whole rogue's gallery stored in one of the boxes.
translation.zh: 显然那些保险箱里装了大堆这类照片

translation.en: If Lord Drysdale is up to his usual hanky panky, that's his problem.
translation.zh:
如果德赖斯代尔勋爵还在这样玩
那是他的问题

translation.en: This operation is about recovering the photos from Michael X.
translation.zh:
这次行动是为了
拿回迈克艾克斯那儿的照片

translation.en: Might it not be prudent to get the committee to consider issuing a D-notice?
translation.zh: 让委员会考虑发布一项国防机密通知

translation.en: potentially embarrassed by this criminal activity.
translation.zh:
来保护所有这种犯罪的潜在受害者
会不会太过谨慎？

translation.en: Which we instigated.
translation.zh: 我们已经开始了

translation.en: [man] Very nice. Very nice indeed.
translation.zh: 好极了 实在是好极了

translation.en: there were a couple of lads taking some photos.
translation.zh:
我走出银行的时候
有几个小伙子在拍照

translation.en: Photos of him.
translation.zh: 给他拍照

translation.en: Now, he was standing right outside the bank
translation.zh: 在银行被抢的几天前

translation.en: just a few days before it was robbed.
translation.zh: 他就站在银行外面

translation.en: I thought at the time he looked a bit shifty.
translation.zh: 我当时觉得他看起来有点鬼鬼祟祟

translation.en: Oh! Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Christ, is that thing real?
translation.zh: 那玩意儿是真的吗？

translation.en: I've got it. Dave Schilling.
translation.zh: 我想起来了 戴夫希林

translation.en: That's his name.
translation.zh: 他的名字

translation.en: Ta ta, Mum. Look after yourself, love. Mmm…
translation.zh:
-我走了 妈妈
-照顾好自己 亲爱的

translation.en: Go and get yourself inside. You'll catch your death.
translation.zh: 回去吧 小心别生病

translation.en: Dave Schilling? Yeah?
translation.zh:
-戴夫希林吗？
-什么事？

translation.en: I wonder if we could have a word.
translation.zh: 可以聊聊吗？

translation.en: About what?
translation.zh: 聊什么？

translation.en: About a bank.
translation.zh: 一家银行的事

translation.en: I want to tell you something, Mr. Schilling, 'cause it'll save time.
translation.zh:
我想告诉你点事 希林先生
这样可以节省些时间

translation.en: You see,
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: I have a very jaundiced view of life.
translation.zh: 我对生活有着很大偏见

translation.en: From what I've seen, most of it's corrupt, venal, and vile.
translation.zh:
我看到的大部分
都是贪污腐败 卑鄙下流的事

translation.en: And I'm saying this so that you know
translation.zh: 我这么说只是想让你知道我没有

translation.en: that I don't have a better nature to appeal to
translation.zh: 我这么说只是想让你知道我没有 更善良或是更富有同情心

translation.en: or a compassionate streak.
translation.zh: 更善良或是更富有同情心

translation.en: I mean, you do understand, don't you?
translation.zh: 你明白我的意思 是吧？

translation.en: I think so, Mr. Vogel.
translation.zh:
-我想我明白 沃格尔先生
-很好

translation.en: I have a kidney stone that I don't seem to be able to pass.
translation.zh: 我有肾结石 疼得让人受不了 所以我在吃止痛药

translation.en: I'm on pain killers.
translation.zh: 疼得让人受不了 所以我在吃止痛药

translation.en: I could use a couple of those meself.
translation.zh: 我也应该吃两颗

translation.en: You stole from me.
translation.zh: 你偷走了我…

translation.en: And from friends of mine.
translation.zh: 和我朋友的东西

translation.en: Now, where's my stuff? I don't know.
translation.zh:
-我的东西在哪儿？
-我不知道

translation.en: Look, I don't know anything about any bank robbery. Honest.
translation.zh: 听着 我对银行抢劫案一无所知

translation.en: Still an unconvincing actor, Mr. Schilling.
translation.zh: 演技还是不怎么样啊 希林先生

translation.en: I would love to say this is not gonna hurt,
translation.zh: 我很想说这不会疼

translation.en: but it is.
translation.zh: 但它会很疼

translation.en: What-- what are you gonna do?
translation.zh: 你要做什么？

translation.en: Wait! No! No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: No! N--
translation.zh: 不！停下！

translation.en: Please! No!
translation.zh: 求你了！ 不！停下！求你了！
不！停下！求你了！

translation.en: Well, they were here. Well, they ain't here now.
translation.zh:
-他们来过这里
-现在不在了

translation.en: Boys, it's all right.
translation.zh: 为什么门开着？

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.zh: 你们是谁？

translation.en: I could ask the same thing.
translation.zh: 我也正想问你们

translation.en: Better run along, eh?
translation.zh: 最好还是走吧

translation.en: Get yourselves a cup of tea or something.
translation.zh: 去喝杯茶什么的

translation.en: We're looking for Terry Leather.
translation.zh: 我们在找特里莱瑟

translation.en: Terry said he won't be coming in this week.
translation.zh: 特里说他这周不来了

translation.en: He's supposed to call in.
translation.zh: 他应该打电话过来的

translation.en: So you'd be Eddie, right?
translation.zh: 那你就是艾迪 对吧？

translation.en: Well, you're coming with me.
translation.zh:
-是我
-那你跟我走吧

translation.en: What do you think you're doing? Leave him alone. Don't you…
translation.zh: 放开他 你们要对艾迪做什么？

translation.en: Shut your noise!
translation.zh:
-别吵
-放开她！

translation.en: We want to talk to him about a bank robbery.
translation.zh: 我们想跟他聊聊一起银行抢劫案

translation.en: [Eddie] Don't you touch her!
translation.zh:
-别碰她！
-如果你还想见到艾迪

translation.en: If you want to see your Eddie or his mate Dave again,
translation.zh:
-别碰她！
-如果你还想见到艾迪 或是戴夫 就让特里莱瑟打这个电话

translation.en: make sure Terry Leather calls that number.
translation.zh: 或是戴夫 就让特里莱瑟打这个电话

translation.en: Wha…
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Walkie-talkie gang takes it all!
translation.zh: 对讲机团伙实施了大抢劫！

translation.en: Read all about it!
translation.zh: 来看看啊！

translation.en: Walkie-talkie gang takes it all!
translation.zh: 对讲机团伙实施了抢劫！

translation.en: [Tim] That's great news, over.
translation.zh: 真是个好消息 完毕

translation.en: [Terry] We're taking a break. Need to get some sleep.
translation.zh: 我们要休息一下 在尘土散去之前

translation.en: Get a bit of shuteye while the fumes clear out. Over.
translation.zh: 我们需要睡一会儿

translation.en: [Eddie] Oh, lucky you. My eyes are like…
translation.zh:
-完毕
-你们是舒服了 我的眼睛都要睁不开…

translation.en: Mommy, Daddy's on the radio.
translation.zh: 妈妈 收音机里是爸爸的声音

translation.en: Oh, don't be so silly, darling. He is!
translation.zh:
-别傻了 亲爱的
-真的！

translation.en: Is he?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: [Eddie] I want a warm bath and a cup of tea, over.
translation.zh: 我想洗个热水澡 喝杯茶 完毕

translation.en: [Terry] You'll get your cup of tea. Just your type.
translation.zh: 你会喝到茶的 看好了 完毕

translation.en: See? It is, Daddy.
translation.zh: 听 是爸爸

translation.en: [man] Authorities have released this recording
translation.zh: 警方公布了马里波恩路

translation.en: of the walkie-talkie communications
translation.zh: 劳埃德银行

translation.en: between the robbers of Lloyds Bank in Marylebone
translation.zh: 抢劫犯间的对讲机通话录音

translation.en: in the hopes that their voices…
translation.zh: 希望公众能辨认出

translation.en: -[phone rings] -may be identified by members…
translation.zh: 他们的声音

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Wendy?
translation.zh: 温迪？

translation.en: We heard you on the radio, Terry. You're famous, you know.
translation.zh:
我们在收音机上听到了你 特里
你出名了 知道吗？

translation.en: You robbed that bank, didn't you? The one in the news. Oh, God.
translation.zh: 你们抢了银行 是吗？新闻里那个？

translation.en: You could go to jail for years for something like that, Terry.
translation.zh: 天啊 这样的事情

translation.en: I couldn't stand it.
translation.zh:
你会被判很多年的 特里
这要我怎么接受

translation.en: No one's going to jail. I've got it all under control.
translation.zh: 没有人要坐牢 一切尽在掌握

translation.en: Just stay put. Keep the kids inside.
translation.zh: 冷静点 别让孩子们出门

translation.en: I love you, Wendy.
translation.zh: 我爱你 温迪

translation.en: I've got to go.
translation.zh: 我得挂了

translation.en: You be careful, Terry. [girl] What's the matter, Mom?
translation.zh:
-千万小心 特里
-怎么了 妈妈？

translation.en: Nothing, darling.
translation.zh: 没什么 亲爱的

translation.en: Terry. They took Eddie.
translation.zh: 特里 他们带走了艾迪

translation.en: Oh, God. Who? Two heavies.
translation.zh:
-天啊 谁？
-他们不是小偷或者…

translation.en: I don't know. They could have been cops.
translation.zh: 我不知道 他们可能是警察

translation.en: They left a phone number for you.
translation.zh: 他们给你留了个电话号码

translation.en: They said if I wanted to see Dave or Eddie again,
translation.zh: 他们说想要再见到戴夫 或是艾迪 你就要给他们打电话

translation.en: then you have to call.
translation.zh: 或是艾迪 你就要给他们打电话

translation.en: Listen to me. I swear to you I'll get him back.
translation.zh:
听我说 英格丽
我保证我会救他回来

translation.en: Don't you worry, darling. Have you got a pen?
translation.zh:
-别担心 亲爱的
-你有笔吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 有

translation.en: 01946--  Hold on. Say it again.
translation.zh:
-01946…
-等下 再说一次

translation.en: Michael, it's Lew Vogel. [Michael] Yes?
translation.zh:
-迈克 我是卢沃格尔
-怎么样了？

translation.en: Well, we've identified the villains.
translation.zh: 我们已经确认了劫匪身份

translation.en: And believe it or not, they're amateurs. Part-timers.
translation.zh: 信不信由你 他们是新手 业余的

translation.en: They were put up to the job by a woman named Martine Love.
translation.zh:
他们是由一个
叫玛汀洛夫的女人组织的

translation.en: -Ring a bell? -Never heard of her.
translation.zh:
-有印象吗？
-没听说过

translation.en: Well, we paid a visit to her flat.
translation.zh: 我们去了她的公寓

translation.en: And some chaps from MI5 were already there.
translation.zh: 而军情五处的人已经在那里了

translation.en: Pulled rank on my tame copper.
translation.zh: 把我的人给赶走了

translation.en: Why do you suppose these people would be interested
translation.zh: 你觉得是什么让这些人

translation.en: in the robbery of a minor neighborhood bank, Michael?
translation.zh: 你觉得是什么让这些人 对一起小小的银行劫案如此感兴趣？

translation.en: I don't know. I think you do.
translation.zh:
-我不知道
-我想你很清楚

translation.en: And I'm guessing that your box is number 118.
translation.zh: 我想你的保险箱是118号

translation.en: I think what these robbers were really after were photographs.
translation.zh: 我想劫匪的真正目标就是那些照片

translation.en: Photographs of a certain royal princess.
translation.zh: 某位王室公主的照片

translation.en: How do you know that?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: Well, because on this point I believe my captive.
translation.zh: 因为在这一点上 我相信我的俘虏

translation.en: No man can withstand the pain we inflicted on him.
translation.zh: 没有人能承受我们施加给他的痛苦

translation.en: So don't take me for a fool, Michael.
translation.zh: 所以别把我当傻子 迈克

translation.en: You've instigated this calamity
translation.zh: 是你把勒索材料

translation.en: by storing your blackmail materials in this bank.
translation.zh: 存在这家银行才引发了这场灾难

translation.en: Which you recommended.
translation.zh: 你推荐的银行 我不需要听

translation.en: I will not be lectured by the porn king of Soho.
translation.zh:
你推荐的银行 我不需要听 苏豪区的色情大王说教
把我的照片拿回来

translation.en: Get my pictures back
translation.zh:
苏豪区的色情大王说教
把我的照片拿回来

translation.en: or you will never see a Black man on the streets of London
translation.zh:
否则你在伦敦大街上
看到任何一个黑人

translation.en: without wondering if he's been sent to kill you!
translation.zh: 都要担心担心他是不是被派来杀你的

translation.en: What you doing? Oh, hello, Michael.
translation.zh:
-你在做什么？
-嗨 迈克

translation.en: Hakim was looking for a copy of his book.
translation.zh: 哈基姆在找一本他的书

translation.en: I know what you been looking for, birds. And you won't find it.
translation.zh: 我知道你在找什么 但你找不到的

translation.en: You set this whole thing up from the start, didn't you?
translation.zh: 一开始你就计划好了 不是吗？

translation.en: Come on. You get to be rich, free and clear.
translation.zh: 拜托 你有钱了 也自由清白了

translation.en: Isn't that what you wanted?
translation.zh: 那不是你想要的吗？

translation.en: You stay here with the car. -Right. -Uh!
translation.zh:
-你就在车里
-好

translation.en: Ohh. Bloody kidney stone.
translation.zh: 该死的肾结石

translation.en: It's got to pass soon.
translation.zh: 又要痛起来了

translation.en: Haven't had this much excitement since the war.
translation.zh: 战后还没这么兴奋过呢

translation.en: We're a little late, My Lord.
translation.zh: 我们来晚了一点 先生

translation.en: So where's your mate?
translation.zh: 你的朋友在哪儿？

translation.en: That's Terry there, by the newsstand.
translation.zh: 报摊旁边的就是特里

translation.en: Wait. I've seen those two cowboys before, at the girls' flat.
translation.zh: 等下 我在那女孩的公寓见过那两人

translation.en: It's a trap. They're MI5.
translation.zh: 这是陷阱 是军情五处的人

translation.en: [Eddie] Terry. Terry!
translation.zh: 特里！

translation.en: Lord Mountbatten?
translation.zh:
-蒙巴顿勋爵？
-是的

translation.en: -Yes? -You know the arrangement,
translation.zh: 清楚我们的协议吧？

translation.en: and you agree to our new identities and immunity from prosecution?
translation.zh: 你同意给我们新身份并免于起诉？

translation.en: You have my word that the crown will honor this commitment.
translation.zh: 我向你保证 王室会信守承诺

translation.en: Your documentation and guarantees.
translation.zh: 你要的文件和保证书

translation.en: If I were you, I'd keep them in a very safe place.
translation.zh: 我要是你 就会好好保管它们

translation.en: Yeah, well, you can bet it won't be a safe deposit box.
translation.zh: 我敢保证它们不会被放进保险箱

translation.en: She is a scallywag. Thank you.
translation.zh: 她是个无赖 谢谢

translation.en: Martine.
translation.zh: 玛汀

translation.en: It wasn't all business for me.
translation.zh: 这一切对我来说不只是公事

translation.en: -What's happening? Where's the book? -[man] Just open the door.
translation.zh:
-怎么回事？账簿呢？
-开门

translation.en: -No. No. -Get in there.
translation.zh:
-不！
-进去

translation.en: Stay there or you're dead meat.
translation.zh: 别动否则你就死定了

translation.en: -Uhh! -Where you going, old man, eh?
translation.zh: 你要去哪儿 老家伙？

translation.en: -This one's for Dave. -No.
translation.zh:
-这是为了戴夫
-不

translation.en: -Uh. There, you fucker! -Aah!
translation.zh: 王八蛋！

translation.en: So fucking smug now, are you?
translation.zh: 你现在得意不起来了吧？

translation.en: Oi, you-- Uh. Uh. Oh.
translation.zh: 喂 你这个混蛋…

translation.en: Get out. That's the bloke that killed Dave.
translation.zh:
-艾迪 下车
-是那个人杀了戴夫

translation.en: Get your hands off me.
translation.zh: 放开我！

translation.en: Arrest them. They're the bank robbers.
translation.zh: 逮捕他们 他们是银行劫匪

translation.en: -Fuck! -[Eddie] This bloke killed our friend.
translation.zh:
-他妈的！
-这人杀了我们的朋友

translation.en: I'm innocent.
translation.zh:
-该死
-我们是无辜的

translation.en: So are we seriously arse up now, Terry?
translation.zh: 特里 我们完蛋了是吧？

translation.en: At least we're not dead, like poor, old Dave.
translation.zh: 至少我们没像可怜的戴夫那样死去

translation.en: Get up, you filthy bastard.
translation.zh:
-起来吧 混蛋
-我要…

translation.en: You're under arrest. Take him away.
translation.zh:
你被逮捕了 -带他走
-走吧

translation.en: [man] Right. Come on, you.
translation.zh:
-带他走
-走吧

translation.en: [man] Get in the car.
translation.zh: 上车

translation.en: It's all right, mate.
translation.zh: 我尽力了 伙计

translation.en: Wonder if that's Roy Given.
translation.zh: 不知道那是不是罗伊吉文

translation.en: Who's he?
translation.zh: 他是谁？

translation.en: We was hoping he was a straight copper.
translation.zh: 希望他是个好警察

translation.en: We've got a nice collar here, Roy.
translation.zh: 这次逮捕很成功 罗伊

translation.en: You know these two were part of the Baker Street bank robbery gang.
translation.zh:
你知道这俩人都是
贝克街银行抢劫团伙的成员吧？

translation.en: Place this man under arrest. -[man] Yes, sir. -What are you talking about?
translation.zh:
-逮捕他
-是 长官

translation.en: They're part of the Baker Street firm.
translation.zh:
你在说什么？他们是
贝克街银行抢劫团伙的成员

translation.en: I don't know about them,
translation.zh:
我不知道他们做了什么
但我知道你做了什么

translation.en: but I know about you, you corrupt bastard.
translation.zh:
我不知道他们做了什么
但我知道你做了什么 你是个贪赃枉法的混蛋 拷了他

translation.en: Cuff him, and the one over by the wall as well.
translation.zh: 你是个贪赃枉法的混蛋 拷了他 还有墙边那家伙

translation.en: But they're the robbers.
translation.zh: 他们是抢劫犯

translation.en: No robbers in here.
translation.zh: 这里没有抢劫犯

translation.en: [man] Watch your head.
translation.zh: 当心你的头

translation.en: Now. I believe you've a certain
translation.zh:
先生… 我相信沃格尔先生
那本贿赂账簿就在你这里

translation.en: Mr. Vogel's book of shame.
translation.zh:
我相信沃格尔先生
那本贿赂账簿就在你这里

translation.en: I'll go get it for you.
translation.zh: 你放我出去的话 我就把它给你

translation.en: That belongs to me.
translation.zh: 那是我的

translation.en: There's your book.
translation.zh: 你要的账簿

translation.en: [Tim] Terry. We were thinking, smart fellow like you
translation.zh: 特里 我们在想 像你这么聪明的人

translation.en: might have kept mementos of the event, just in case.
translation.zh: 可能会留点纪念品以防万一

translation.en: In case what? Things didn't turn out so nicely?
translation.zh: 以防什么？结果不太妙吗？

translation.en: If they should ever see the light of day,
translation.zh: 如果那些东西有一天重见天日

translation.en: don't think we can't find you.
translation.zh: 不要以为我们找不到你

translation.en: Out. Go on, piss off.
translation.zh: 出来吧！ 快滚吧

translation.en: And you. Go on.
translation.zh: 还有你也一样

translation.en: -How did that happen? -Fucked if I know. Just keep walking.
translation.zh:
-怎么回事？
-我怎么知道 继续走就是了

translation.en: [man] Michael, Michael.
translation.zh: 迈克！

translation.en: What's going on? What you want to my place, huh?
translation.zh: 怎么了？ 你们到我的地盘做什么？

translation.en: -What you want? -We are placing you under arrest.
translation.zh:
-你们要做什么？
-我们要逮捕你

translation.en: What am I charged with?
translation.zh: 凭什么逮捕我？

translation.en: Conspiracy to import drugs
translation.zh: 凭什么逮捕我？ 密谋向英国走私毒品

translation.en: into the United Kingdom.
translation.zh: 密谋向英国走私毒品

translation.en: Will that do? But you could still help yourself.
translation.zh: 够了吗？但你还能帮帮你自己

translation.en: There's a British national staying with you,
translation.zh: 和你一起有个英国人

translation.en: a certain Gale Benson.
translation.zh: 盖尔本森

translation.en: She was here but she's gone on.
translation.zh: 她之前在 但现在她已经走了

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [man] Over here, sir.
translation.zh: 在这里 长官

translation.en: Burn the house down. I want nothing of this place left standing.
translation.zh: 把这房子烧了 别留下任何东西

translation.en: Were you friends of Dave?
translation.zh:
曾以为会是永远 -你们是戴夫的朋友吗？
-是的

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. -When?
translation.zh:
-你们是戴夫的朋友吗？
-是的

translation.en: We knew him in a professional capacity. [giggles]
translation.zh: 我们在工作时认识的

translation.en: [woman] He was one of our favorites.
translation.zh: 他是我们最喜欢的同事

translation.en: You all right?
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-还好

translation.en: Yeah. So where are you off to, Kev?
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-还好 所以你打算去哪儿 凯文？

translation.en: Anywhere you wanna go.
translation.zh: 你想去哪儿就去哪儿

translation.en: Sorry. I'm doing a solo from now on.
translation.zh: 抱歉 今后我打算一个人走了

translation.en: Yeah, well, it was worth a try.
translation.zh: 好吧 我至少试过了

translation.en: Do you want another one?
translation.zh: 想再喝一杯吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Go on. One for the road.
translation.zh: 可以啊 庆祝上路

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 来吧 伙计

translation.en: I just wish Dave could've seen all this.
translation.zh: 真希望戴夫能看到这一切

translation.en: Yeah. Here's to Dave.
translation.zh: 是啊 这一杯敬戴夫

translation.en: -[clinking] -[all] To Dave.
translation.zh:
-敬戴夫
-敬戴夫

translation.en: What do you want, Martine?
translation.zh: 你想要什么 玛汀？

translation.en: I'm sorry I've caused you this upset, Wendy.
translation.zh: 抱歉让你这么心烦 温迪

translation.en: Well, apparently, we're rich.
translation.zh: 显然我们有钱了

translation.en: I know the business is finished, but are the cars really ours?
translation.zh:
我知道生意已经结束了
但那些车真的属于我们了吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: They're all yours.
translation.zh: 都归你们了

translation.en: Jessell's been paid off.
translation.zh: 欠杰塞尔的钱已经还了

translation.en: I won't lie to you. I'd have gone with him…
translation.zh: 我不想骗你 我愿意和他远走高飞

translation.en: and I'd have shut you out of my mind.
translation.zh: 完全不去想你

translation.en: But he didn't want to know.
translation.zh: 但他不那么想

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 很抱歉

translation.en: Your wife's talking to Martine.
translation.zh: 你的妻子在跟玛汀聊天

translation.en: I know, Kev.
translation.zh: 我知道 凯文

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: It was always you, Terry.
translation.zh: 总是你 特里

translation.en: [Wendy] Yay!
translation.zh: 来吧 爸爸！

translation.en: Nice with a few chips, though, huh?
translation.zh: 能让我们好好吃一顿了

translation.en: -Whoo. Whoo! -No, Mom!
translation.zh: 别拿过来 妈妈

translation.en: Fish fingers tonight, eh?
translation.zh: 今晚吃炸鱼条吧？
